column1: S&C Global Network - AI - Supply Chain Analytics - Manager
column2: Entity :- Accenture Strategy & Consulting Team :- Strategy & Consulting Global Network Practice :-  Supply Chian Analytics Title :- Manager Job location :- Bangalore/Gurgaon/Hyderabad/ Mumbai Job Description CL 7 (Data Science Manager Supply Chain Planning) The ideal candidate shall be, An expert in Supply chain operations domain and Data Science skills. Responsible to solution architect, design, build, deploy, deliver, and monitor advanced analytics models for supply chain planning areas such as demand, supply, procurement, inventory, spares, etc. planning. Interface with clients to understand engineering/business problems and translate it into analytics problems that shall deliver insights for action and operational improvements. Take initiatives and collaborate with different Accenture internal teams and support driving sales. Provide innovation and thought leadership support to build key capability areas such as tools & technology, new solutions in supply chain planning and assets & accelerators development. Experience and Education: A minimum 7-9 years of experience in industrial/consulting or related areas is needed with at least 5 years of supply chain advanced analytics solutions design and delivery experience. Good to have global client experiences.  Ideal candidates should have a bachelor's degree preferably in Industrial/ Production/ Statistics/ Economics etc. and master's degree in Statistics/ Economics/ Operations Management/ Supply Chain/ Data Science, etc. Certifications in any one or two of the areas will be an added advantage:Python, AI/ML, Optimization, Simulation, any of the cloud platforms (Azure/ GCP/ AWS).
column11: advanced analytics, supply chain, supply chain operations, industrial, data science, python, purchase, microsoft azure, logistics, supply, artificial intelligence, sales, supply chain planning, gcp, procurement, supply chain management, aws, inventory management, ml

column2: As part of our Analytics and Insights Consumption team, you ll analyze data to drive useful insights for clients to address core business issues or to drive strategic outcomes. Youll use visualization, statistical and analytics models, AI/ML techniques, Modelops and other techniques to develop these insights.               Years of Experience:    Candidates with 12+ years of hands on experience             Must Have:           In-depth knowledge of supply chain processes, logistics, inventory management, and demand forecasting within various industries         Strong understanding of financial concepts and analytics to provide insights into budgeting, cost optimization, and financial forecasting         Experience in developing demand forecasting models to optimize inventory levels, reduce stockouts         Ability to apply data science to optimize budget allocation, reduce costs, and improve financial performance, perform finance, cash payroll forecasting through AI/ML techniques.          Good knowledge of statistics    For e.g   : statistical tests & distributions         Experience in Data analysis    For e.g   : data cleansing, standardization and data preparation for the machine learning use cases         Experience in machine learning frameworks and tools (For e.g. scikit-learn, mlr, caret, H2O, TensorFlow,, Pytorch, MLlib)         Advanced level programming in SQL and Python/Pyspark to guide teams         Expertise with visualization tools    For e.g   : Tableau, PowerBI, AWS QuickSight etc.                Nice to have:           Working knowledge of containerization ( e.g. AWS EKS, Kubernetes), Dockers and data pipeline orchestration (e.g. Airflow)         Experience with model explainability and interpretability techniques         Multi-task and manage multiple deadlines. Responsible for incorporating client/user feedback into the Product         Ability to think through complex user scenarios and design simple yet effective user interactions         Good Communication and presentation skills
column11: Supply chain, data cleansing, Data analysis, Assurance, Data management, Budgeting, Business intelligence, Forecasting, Logistics, SQL

column1: S&C Global Network - AI - Supply Chain Analytics - Manager
column2: Entity :- Accenture Strategy & Consulting Team :- Strategy & Consulting Global Network Practice :-  Supply Chian Analytics Title :- Manager Job location :- Bangalore/Gurgaon/Hyderabad/ Mumbai Job Description CL 7 (Data Science Manager Supply Chain Planning) The ideal candidate shall be, An expert in Supply chain operations domain and Data Science skills. Responsible to solution architect, design, build, deploy, deliver, and monitor advanced analytics models for supply chain planning areas such as demand, supply, procurement, inventory, spares, etc. planning. Interface with clients to understand engineering/business problems and translate it into analytics problems that shall deliver insights for action and operational improvements. Take initiatives and collaborate with different Accenture internal teams and support driving sales. Provide innovation and thought leadership support to build key capability areas such as tools & technology, new solutions in supply chain planning and assets & accelerators development. Experience and Education: A minimum 7-9 years of experience in industrial/consulting or related areas is needed with at least 5 years of supply chain advanced analytics solutions design and delivery experience. Good to have global client experiences.  Ideal candidates should have a bachelor's degree preferably in Industrial/ Production/ Statistics/ Economics etc. and master's degree in Statistics/ Economics/ Operations Management/ Supply Chain/ Data Science, etc. Certifications in any one or two of the areas will be an added advantage:Python, AI/ML, Optimization, Simulation, any of the cloud platforms (Azure/ GCP/ AWS). Qualification Mandatory Skills: Must have: Good understanding of overall supply chain planning and operations of any of the industries (CPG, Life sciences, Pharma, Industrial, Resources) and connect it with analytics solutions. Deep understanding of advanced analytics solutions descriptive, diagnostic, predictive, prescriptive, and generative and hands-on experience in building models using machine learning, deep learning, Gen AI models. Strong experience in any one or two of the supply chain functions demand planning, inventory planning, S&OP, logistics planning, etc. Hands-on programming experience with any of the analytics tools, data bases and visualization tools and platforms (Python, PySpark, SQL, Bigdata tools, PowerBI/ Tableau). column2: Overview Pricing and Promotion Analytics Lead provides leadership, direction, and expertise to the team of Pricing Analysts, ensuring the effective execution of pricing and promotion strategies in a Consumer Packaged Goods (CPG) environment. The key responsibilities of the Sr. Manager includes: Provide guidance on complex data analysis, including Price elasticity, Pricing Conjoint and Perceived Value study to support data-driven decision-making Lead, coach, and mentor the Price Elasticity Associates, fostering a collaborative and high-performing team culture Ensure the successful execution of pricing, promotion, and product mix strategies, meeting or exceeding business objectives Communicate complex data-driven insights and recommendations effectively to senior leadership and other key stakeholders Oversee project planning, coordination, and execution to meet established goals and timelines Encourage innovative thinking and problem-solving to continuously improve strategies and processes Ensure team members are proficient in utilizing company-specific software systems Improve existing capabilities on Pricing and Promo Analytics by staying on top of industry trends and best practices.Pricing and Promotion Analytics Sr. Manager plays a crucial role in orchestrating the efforts of the associates, driving data-driven pricing and promotion decisions, and ensuring the team's strategies are aligned with the company's objectives. Effective leadership, communication, and analytical skills are essential for success in this role Responsibilities Functional Responsibilities Provide guidance and support to associates, assisting in their professional development; serve as a subject matter expert and resource for the team Collaborate with the leadership team on pricing and promotion strategies; assist in the development and refinement of pricing strategies in the CPG sector Influence Business on Pricing and Promotion decisions, support the development of a clear channel and customer promotion strategy. Monitor and support the execution of pricing, promotion, and product mix strategies; help ensure thet strategies align with business objectives Offer expertise in data analysis, including Price Elasticity, Pricing Conjoint, and Promotion Effectiveness; assist team members with analytical tools and methodologies for data-driven decision-making Assist in gathering critical insights, market data, and competitive intelligence for pricing and promotion strategies; collaborate with the team to communicate findings effectively Define promotional guidelines and optimal offers, identify promotion frequency to deliver targeted Consumer Value, Effectiveness, and Profitability. Improve existing promotion strategies and develop new ones to improve Promo ROI and market share. Manage expectations through effective verbal and written communication with division, sector, and sales functions. Conduct quality checks and take end to end responsibility of deliverables by the team. Ensure the delivery of accurate and timely data in accordance with agreed service level agreements (SLA) Collaborate with multiple functions to gather insights for action-oriented cause of change analysis Prioritize speed of execution and quality of service delivery over simply meeting SLAs Recognize opportunities for improvement in the delivery of work and take proactive action to enhance processes and outcomes  Qualifications 10 to 13 years of experience in Sales Analytics/ Sales Management/ Revenue Managment / Brand Management. Proven track record in building executable commercial and financial strategies with atleast 2 years in a Consumer Packaged Goods (CPG) environment, top-tier consulting preferred. Experience in scoping problems and managing senior stakeholders. A well-rounded background in data analysis across financials and broader consumer, shopper, and commercial insights within the CPG industry, Business Facing experience is a plus. Exceptional analytical skills with advanced proficiency in MS Excel (VBA and Macros) and Alteryx. Understanding of Machine Learning algorithms to build forecasting models using Python (preferred) or R Language. Proficiency in data visualization tools like Tableau or Power BI. Deep grounding in analytical logic, enabling the translation of complex data into powerful insights Proficiency in using PowerPoint to create visually compelling presentations that resonate with senior audiences Clear and impactful communication in the English language, especially in producing high-quality commentary for senior stakeholders Bachelor's degree in engineering, statistics, business administration, or finance and Master's degree Willingness and ability to quickly learn and utilize PepsiCo software systems Exceptional time management skills, including the ability to multitask, set priorities, and plan effectively.
column11: Pricing, Excel, Power BI, Brand Management, Revenue Management, Sales Management, data visualization, Tableau, Machine Learning, Sales Analytics

column2: Specific Responsibilities Independently lead the production of Sector Digital Creative Effectiveness reporting for APAC, AMESA, LATAM, Europe, PBNA, PFNA. Support workstream lead in producing the Global Creative Effectiveness TV & Digital reporting, including: Extracting, cleaning, and manipulating large datasets from various sources required for delivery. Collaborating with cross-functional teams, including Insights, Marketing, Media departments; peers, and senior stakeholders in the Global and Sectors, as well as subcontractors (mainly Creative X and Zappi) to gather datasets and inputs required for delivery. Utilizing advanced data processing techniques and data visualization tools to present the reporting in a clear and compelling manner. Generating and validating XLS and PPT reports. Continuously optimizing reporting data processing to enhance efficiency and accuracy. Supporting Sectors on queries, ad-hoc requests, and projects related to creative effectiveness reporting. Co-lead automation of the Creative effectiveness TV & Digital reporting, including: Exploring new automation opportunities with the workstream team. Leading enhancement of the current offline reporting system through further automation leveraging the latest data programming techniques: Developing and implementing new solutions to streamline data extraction, transformation, and visualization processes. Integrating data from multiple sources into automated reporting solutions, ensuring data consistency and reliability. Testing and validating automated reporting processes to ensure accuracy and reliability of output. Monitoring and maintaining the automated reporting system, troubleshooting issues, and implementing enhancements as needed. Supporting the creation of online Creative Effectiveness reporting: Introducing the subcontractor to the current Scorecarding specifications. Providing critical feedback on the front-end prototypes developed by the subcontractor and broader workstream team, covering user experience design, functionality scope, navigation, data extracts content & structure, and enhancing the Scorecards' usability and functionality for both scorecarding and diverse meta-analyses needs. Supporting the broader workstream team on validation of fully automated online reporting. Ensuring seamless transition and continuity of reporting production during the transition process to automation. 3. Co-lead / support ad-hoc projects of Global Brand and Creative Capability team , such as enhancements of the creative effectiveness evaluation protocols and tools, meta-analyses of creative effectiveness, and more. Qualifications Hard Skills & Qualifications 8+ years of FMCG industry experience  (corporate or agency) in market research, consumer insights, analytics, or similar roles, demonstrating success in executing data analytics projects in complex environments. Bachelor's degree  required (Master's is a plus). Knowledge of  statistical methods and techniques  for data analysis. Proficient in  data analysis  and interpretation . Highly proficient in  revealing insights  from data and  crafting compelling narratives  around them. Strong experience in  manipulating large datasets, optimizing data processing and management . Proficient in  data processing & visualization techniques and tools : Advanced user of Excel, PowerPoint, and Power BI incl. Power Query. VBA knowledge is a plus. Understanding of database management systems (MS Access, SQL). Understanding of data programming languages (e.g. Python / R) is a plus. Understanding of data modeling. Ability to create and maintain  complex reports and dashboards . Familiarity with qualitative or quantative consumer and market research methods . It may encompass any of the methods for performance evaluation, post-evaluation, or tracking for such aspects as packaging, pricing, brand equity, products, product pipelines, concepts, advertising. Or, any of the following: exploratory studies; consumer immersions, segmentation studies, volumetrics, shopper decision tree studies, retail audit data analytics, sales focrecasting, etc.. The key outcome of the experience should be a  general understanding of the research concept , what research entails, and  the ability to effectively synthesize and integrate quantitative data with qualitative findings . Extensive experience in  cross-functional collaboration , demonstrating independent leadership and adeptness in processing feedback. Proven track record in  managing senior stakeholders Expertise in developing and implementing  solutions for  automated  data extraction, integration from multiple sources, transformation, and visualization  is a plus. Soft Skills Excellent project management:  Demonstrates effective project management skills, including independent workstreams management, problem-solving, decision-making, and the ability to meet tight deadlines. Attention to detail and execution excellence:  Delivers meticulous precision and unwavering commitment to accuracy, ensuring top-tier quality in reporting and all tasks. Time management and speed:  Efficiently manages time and prioritizes tasks to deliver results promptly and effectively. Solution-oriented problem solver:  Approaches challenges with a proactive, analytical, and solution-focused mindset, leveraging various data sources and collaborating with cross-functional teams independently. Highly organized, responsive, and skilled in multi-tasking:  Capable of simultaneously managing multiple projects, priorities, and stakeholders, while identifying opportunities for process efficiencies (including proactive trade-off management) and improvement. Proactive and independent:  Works autonomously, anticipating future needs and proactively planning and executing tasks without constant supervision. Collaborative team player:  Excels in working with internal stakeholders and external suppliers to achieve project goals. Strong business communication:  Exhibits excellent written and verbal communication skills, articulating complex ideas effectively in a concise and clear manner. Change management proficiency:  Demonstrates strong change management skills, adapting to new tools and processes seamlessly and facilitating training for others. Organizational savvy:  Navigates the organization effectively, influencing and educating stakeholders to ensure alignment and informed decision-making. Stress resistance and emotional intelligence:  Demonstrates resilience in high-pressure situations while exhibiting adeptness in understanding and managing emotions, maintaining composure, and fostering positive relationships in diverse professional settings. Self-motivation:  Maintains self-motivation while proactively driving business objectives forward and actively pursuing self-development.
column11: data analysis, R, project management, Change management, MS Access, VBA, Power Query, SQL, Python

column2: The CSG BI organization is responsible for insights and recommendations to optimize the user experiences of IT applications. This includes analyses focused on application speed, stability, adoption, and user behaviors. Such work includes data ingestion, data munging, statistical analysis, data modelling, model evaluation, and model deployment. Effective outputs require a simple user-friendly synthesis of information, including actionable insights, analytical solutions, and AI-powe'red products.          The team needs individuals with extensive business and analytical knowledge to deliver high value, actionable insights and recommendations. We are looking for a candidate who has a solid background in analytics, demonstrates proven abilities to be innovative and creative, and is an effective collaborator and communicator enabling influence.          The candidate will have excellent analytics capabilities, expertise in analytical problem-solving techniques, project management skills, and product mindset. He/she will have the experience of working on solving complex analytical problems and should be comfortable with analytical tools. The person will be responsible for operating within a dynamic, fast-paced, scalable & agile IT development environment, which faces both internal and external customers.                 Job Responsibilities:               Delivers analytical insights to provide actionable recommendations to influence Online Support product development and to optimize user experience by considering speed, stability, and key user behaviors;             Develops and delivers on analytics roadmap for Online Support, while always identifying new opportunities and prioritization recommendations;             Works with data engineers, data scientists, architects, application product owners, software developers, UX designers, and business partners to design strategic projects and break complex problems into smaller actionable tasks;             Leads cross-functional engagements to define problem statements, establish KPIs, collect data, process data, build analytical models and make recommendations;             Builds Artificial Intelligence/Machine Learning prototypes;             Develops self-service analytics solutions to automate analytics;             Presents findings to key stakeholders;             Collects feedback and improves deployed products;             Establishes relationship with key stakeholders or Point of Contacts to accelerate issue fixes;             Leverages teamwork or cross-functional collaboration to influence the optimization of Online Support;             Contribute to improving business processes and reducing overall issues for Online Support.               Role Requirements:               Excellent written and verbal communication skills, including the ability to convey analytic insights effectively to both IT and business leaders;             Data Analytics, Data Science, Computer Science, Engineering, or Business Degree, or equivalent professional experience;             8+ years of relevant work experience or 6+ years of work experience with a master degree;              6+ years of experience with data analytics, business analytics, or data science;             Hands-on analytics capabilities, expertise in analytical problem-solving techniques and frameworks, and the ability to deal with large volumes of data;             Experience with Python/R and SQL;             Experience with data visualization tools, such as Power BI, Tableau, or Looker;             Knowledge of machine learning algorithms/concepts;             Proficiency in statistics and research methods;             Self-motivated with excellent capability of dealing with ambiguity;             Demonstrated knowledge of project management, leadership/teamwork, and stakeholder/customer management skills, and business acumen;             Comfortable with data cleaning processes to ensure data integrity;             Eager to learn new skills and knowledge and apply new skills and concepts quickly;                   Preferences:                MBA, Engineering or CS Degree from top schools;             Experience with web analytics tools, such as Google Analytics, Adobe Analytics (SiteCatalyst or Omniture), or Coveo             Experience with Oracle RDMBS, Snowflake, BigQuery             Understanding of Tech Support and/or Order Support processes is a plus;             Understanding of AI ML (Machine Learning)             Understanding of data warehousing and ETL is a plus;             Experience with product management is a plus;             Experience in working with global teams;             Candidates may come from different strategy consulting backgrounds- Management Consulting, Digital strategy or eCommerce strategy.
column11: Product management, Google Analytics, Web analytics, Business analytics, Analytical, Oracle, CRM, SQL, Salesforce

column2: Trendence is looking for Manager - CXM to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey     As the Manager of Customer Experience Management (CXM), you will play a pivotal role in ensuring exceptional customer satisfaction and loyalty through strategic planning, implementation, and optimization of customer experience initiatives     You will lead a team dedicated to understanding customer needs, improving processes, and fostering a customer-centric culture across the organization       Key Responsibilities:       Develop and execute a comprehensive CXM strategy aligned with business goals to enhance customer satisfaction, retention, and advocacy     Lead cross-functional collaboration to gather customer feedback, analyze data, and identify opportunities for improvement across all touchpoints in the customer journey     Implement customer-centric processes and technologies to streamline interactions, improve efficiency, and deliver personalized experiences     Establish key performance indicators (KPIs) and metrics to measure customer experience effectiveness, regularly monitor performance, and drive continuous improvement initiatives     Champion the voice of the customer within the organization, advocating for their needs and preferences in product development, marketing strategies, and service delivery     Develop and nurture a customer-centric culture by fostering empathy, understanding, and accountability among employees at all levels     Provide leadership, mentorship, and support to the CXM team, ensuring alignment with organizational objectives and professional development opportunities     Collaborate with stakeholders to design and implement customer satisfaction surveys, analyze results, and develop action plans to address areas for improvement     Stay updated on industry trends, best practices, and emerging technologies in customer experience management to maintain a competitive edge     Prepare and present regular reports and presentations to senior management, highlighting the impact of CXM initiatives on business performance and customer satisfaction
column11: customer experience management, data analysis, marketing strategies, kpi, process improvement, business development, strategic planning, marketing, operations, customer satisfaction, service delivery, leadership, product development, advocacy, survey, retention

column1: NRM - Pricing and Promo Sr. Manager
column2: Overview Pricing and Promotion Analytics Sr. Manager provides leadership, direction, and expertise to the team of Pricing Analysts, ensuring the effective execution of pricing and promotion strategies in a Consumer Packaged Goods (CPG) environment. The key responsibilities of the Sr. Manager includes: Provide guidance on complex data analysis, including Price elasticity, Pricing Conjoint and Perceived Value study to support data-driven decision-making Lead, coach, and mentor the Price Elasticity Associates, fostering a collaborative and high-performing team culture Ensure the successful execution of pricing, promotion, and product mix strategies, meeting or exceeding business objectives Communicate complex data-driven insights and recommendations effectively to senior leadership and other key stakeholders Oversee project planning, coordination, and execution to meet established goals and timelines Encourage innovative thinking and problem-solving to continuously improve strategies and processes Ensure team members are proficient in utilizing company-specific software systems Improve existing capabilities on Pricing and Promo Analytics by staying on top of industry trends and best practices.Pricing and Promotion Analytics Sr. Manager plays a crucial role in orchestrating the efforts of the associates, driving data-driven pricing and promotion decisions, and ensuring the team's strategies are aligned with the company's objectives. Effective leadership, communication, and analytical skills are essential for success in this role Responsibilities Functional Responsibilities Provide guidance and support to associates, assisting in their professional development; serve as a subject matter expert and resource for the team Collaborate with the leadership team on pricing and promotion strategies; assist in the development and refinement of pricing strategies in the CPG sector Influence Business on Pricing and Promotion decisions, support the development of a clear channel and customer promotion strategy. Monitor and support the execution of pricing, promotion, and product mix strategies; help ensure thet strategies align with business objectives Offer expertise in data analysis, including Price Elasticity, Pricing Conjoint, and Promotion Effectiveness; assist team members with analytical tools and methodologies for data-driven decision-making Assist in gathering critical insights, market data, and competitive intelligence for pricing and promotion strategies; collaborate with the team to communicate findings effectively Define promotional guidelines and optimal offers, identify promotion frequency to deliver targeted Consumer Value, Effectiveness, and Profitability. Improve existing promotion strategies and develop new ones to improve Promo ROI and market share. Manage expectations through effective verbal and written communication with division, sector, and sales functions. Conduct quality checks and take end to end responsibility of deliverables by the team. Ensure the delivery of accurate and timely data in accordance with agreed service level agreements (SLA) Collaborate with multiple functions to gather insights for action-oriented cause of change analysis Prioritize speed of execution and quality of service delivery over simply meeting SLAs Recognize opportunities for improvement in the delivery of work and take proactive action to enhance processes and outcomes  Qualifications 9 to 12 years of experience in Sales Analytics/ Sales Management/ Revenue Managment / Brand Management. Proven track record in building executable commercial and financial strategies with atleast 2 years in a Consumer Packaged Goods (CPG) environment, top-tier consulting preferred. Experience in scoping problems and managing senior stakeholders. A well-rounded background in data analysis across financials and broader consumer, shopper, and commercial insights within the CPG industry, Business Facing experience is a plus. Exceptional analytical skills with advanced proficiency in MS Excel (VBA and Macros) and Alteryx. Understanding of Machine Learning algorithms to build forecasting models using Python (preferred) or R Language. Proficiency in data visualization tools like Tableau or Power BI. Deep grounding in analytical logic, enabling the translation of complex data into powerful insights Proficiency in using PowerPoint to create visually compelling presentations that resonate with senior audiences Clear and impactful communication in the English language, especially in producing high-quality commentary for senior stakeholders Bachelor's degree in engineering, statistics, business administration, or finance and Master's degree Willingness and ability to quickly learn and utilize PepsiCo software systems Exceptional time management skills, including the ability to multitask, set priorities, and plan effectively
column11: Sales Analytics, data analysis, VBA, Power BI, Brand Management, Alteryx, Revenue Management, Sales Management, Tableau, Macros

column2: Responsibilities Sector focused + Team management responsibilities. HTW Project Management: Utilizing comprehensive U&A (Usage and Attitude) data to extract actionable insights assigned KBQs.  Help design and execute governance model, identify opportunities / address issues. concerns. Business Question Translation: Partner across Ex UK Bus to identify key business needs. Possess a strong acumen for understanding complex business queries and adeptness in translating them into insightful workstreams.  Step up the all-round HTW agenda and deliverables via best-in-class partnership and integrated insights where possible. Data Analysis and Insight Generation: Bring impactful insights partnering with Ex UK BU leads and other stakeholders ensuring consumer centricity is embedded in all business decisions. Demonstrate proficiency in tackling intricate problems by dissecting them into manageable components using U&A data. Bringing together multisource insights into a cohesive narrative  Craft compelling narratives and presentations to communicate findings effectively.  Stakeholder Management: Engage in effective stakeholder management and closely collaborate with Ex UK Business Units (eg Turkey, Spain, Poland - TBD) and Bottlers Work closely with Ex UK BUs to improve quality of partnership and identify and un-lock further efficiencies. Help develop and harmonize best practices. Ensure alignment of research efforts with organizational objectives.  Manage day to day relationship with stakeholders, peers and agencies (if needed)  Matrix Structure Navigation / Team Collaboration: Navigate seamlessly through our organization's complex matrix structure, fostering collaboration and synergy across various teams and departments. Exhibit strong teamwork and collaboration skills,  Openly collaborate with colleagues to leverage collective expertise and insights. Work closely to develop capabilities and / or deploy new capabilities. Qualifications Experience: 10+ years of experience in research, with a focus on quantitative data analysis. Strong consumer insights experience - end-to-end understanding of the best-in-class research approaches Some GBS or Client-side (FMCG/ CPG companies) experience will be a plus Working both in at agency & at manufacturer/company side is a  Working in a beverage (or food and beverage) organization is a plus. Strong project management skills; track record of overseeing a portfolio of complex data heavy projects, gained in large organizations Willingness to relocate to Hyderabad. Analytical Skills: Ability to connect dots across different sources of data combined with excellent story telling skills Proficient in Excel and experienced in reviewing and analysing large datasets with precision and accuracy. Experience at managing multi-country / functional projects.  Strategic Insights: Previous experience in strategic insights, demand spaces, segmentation and consumer U&A is highly desirable. Strong influencing skills and strategic thinker Excellent analytical, critical thinking and problem-solving skills. Communication: Compelling storyteller & communicator Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written, with the ability to articulate complex concepts clearly and concisely. Strong leadership, organizational and interpersonal skills. Experience managing a culturally diverse senior stakeholder group. Solid presentational skills. Adaptability: Ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment, adapting to evolving priorities and challenges with agility and resilience. Independence and action-oriented way or working Ability to manage senior stakeholders, managing demand  Working matrix organization excellent relationship builder who can work x-functionally/x-geography and organisation wide. Self-motivated/self-starter with the ability to work independently. Flexibility in adjusting & reprioritizing to meet changing needs in a fast-paced environment.

column2: Bring world class skills to lead and direct one or more project teams engaged in global initiatives across Functional, Regional, and     Business Units; bring to realization data products and capabilities to propel Medtronic forward.      Engaging a diverse set of stakeholders and leaders throughout the project lifecycle; ensure clear understanding of timelines, challenges, and value.     Utilizing entrepreneurship mindset to take an idea or objective from initiation to closure; managing all aspects to successfully accomplish the goals.     Accountable for the successful implementation of the outcomes derived through the change through effective organization and leadership, business case and benefits management, stakeholder management, risk management and issue resolution, planning and control, change management and quality management.      Ensuring alignment of the project to all Corporate and IT policies and standards; protecting the integrity of Medtronic and its Patients.     Responsible for effectively managing the constraints of project management: Scope, Cost, Schedule. Prepare and deliver regular status reports, executive summaries, and presentations. Maintain project documentation, lessons learned, and best practices.      Monitor stakeholder satisfaction, solicit feedback, and implement improvements to meet or exceed expectations.     Develop comprehensive project plans, timelines, and budgets, considering resource allocation, dependencies, and potential risks.      Coordinate project activities, monitor progress, and ensure adherence to project schedules.     Engage and collaborate with external vendors, contractors, or consultants for project-related activities. Conduct vendor evaluations, ensure contract compliance and manage relationships.             MUST HAVE (Minimum Qualifications)         High school diploma (or equivalent) and 9+ years of experience     -Or- Bachelor s Degree and 7+ years of experience     Prior experience managing data services and data platform related projects within an IT organization.     Prior experience with data analytics and business intelligence tools and techniques.     High degree of interpersonal skills; written, oral, and presentations     Experience working in a Global environment; including integrated employee and vendor teams.         DESIRED/PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS         NICE TO HAVE (Preferred Qualifications)         Previous Medtronic experience     Work experience in the Medical Device Industry, or other regulated industry     Certified Associate in Project Management (CAPM) or Project Management Professional certification     Scrum Master experience     Demonstrated experience understanding and executing the full lifecycle management of a data product.     Prior experience with data governance, data modeling, data integration, data quality, and data security practices.     Experience working in hybrid environments; Cloud and On-Prem.     High degree of learning agility with the ability to readily consume and apply new information and concepts with developed analytical problem-solving skills.

being able to manage deadlines and deliverableso Monitor and act upon regular feedback inputs from deliverables end-users and Business Partnerso Flag and monitor any business risks related to delivering the operational output (facilities, IT resources, recruitment efforts)o Primary executor responsible for flawless support process and structure, including knowledge management and transfer Process management o Due Dieligence and Data qulity assurance For retail Audit and Kantar Husehold Panelo Support communication processes with Reporting vertical leaders and Business Partners (project planning, workflow monitoring, quality checks, on-going changes)o Help Reporting vertical leadership develop and finetune internal COE processes (work-flow mapping, pain-points and bottlenecks management) both related to service delivery and internal center operationso Improve existing processes based on frequent end-user and Business Partner feedback loopo Support simplification, standardization and digitalization efforts (in cooperation with global and sector stakeholders) Qualifications A junior/mid-level Insight or Analytics professional with experience in a leading consumer goods company or research agencies i.e. NIQ, IPSOS,IRI. 3 years+ experience Education: MA in economics, sociology, math, marketing or management  Potential to develop leadership and influencing profile in line with Insights Leader of the future definition: Motivates action through fact-based, inspirational material; column2: The Data Analyst in the Activation team plays a critical role in shaping customer experiences and driving business growth through data-driven strategies. The position requires a blend of technical expertise, analytical thinking, and effective communication skills to achieve success in optimizing customer activation efforts. Working closely with cross-functional teams, utilizing data-driven insights to drive growth and improve customer interactions.                           Key Responsibilities:                         Data Collection and Management:                         Collect and aggregate data from various sources, including CRM systems, marketing platforms, and external sources.                     Ensure data accuracy, cleanliness, and consistency through data cleansing and validation processes.                         Data Analysis:                         Analyse customer behaviour, conversion funnels, and engagement metrics to identify opportunities for improvement.                     Develop and maintain dashboards and reports to monitor key performance indicators (KPIs).                     Insights and Reporting:                     Provide actionable insights to the Activation team and other stakeholders to drive decision-making.                     Create regular reports and ad-hoc analyses to communicate findings and recommendations effectively.                         Segmentation and Targeting:                         Utilize data segmentation techniques to identify target customer segments for personalized activation campaigns.                     Collaborate with the Marketing team to optimize messaging and content for different customer groups.                         Predictive Modeling:                         Build predictive models to forecast customer acquisition, churn, and engagement trends.                     Use machine learning algorithms to identify patterns and opportunities for proactive intervention.                         Qualifications:                         Bachelor's degree in a relevant field such as Data Science, Statistics, Mathematics orBusiness.                         Proven experience in data analysis, preferably in a marketing or customer activation context.                         Proficiency in data manipulation and analysis tools such as SQL, Python, Tableau or Power BI.                       Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to turn data into actionable insights.                     Excellent communication skills to convey findings to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.                     Knowledge of machine learning and predictive modeling is a plus.                     Familiarity with CRM systems, marketing automation platforms, and data warehousing is beneficial.
column11: data cleansing, Customer acquisition, Data analysis, Analytical, Data collection, Predictive modeling, Analytics, CRM, SQL, Python

column2: The portfolio analytics role helps access databases on epidemiology, build early stage models on potential of drugs/molecules, evaluate COGs and make recommendations on thresholds to enable early development set thresholds, build visualization tools that will help interact with senior leaders on the status of our portfolio, bring in quantitative skills eg simulations that enable discounted cash-flow models on advanced programs to help arbitrate choice at stage gates and make recommendations on portfolio prioritization, apart from contributing in evaluating quantitative models for in-licensing opportunities from time to time                         AREAS OF RESPONSIBILITY (AOR)                         Pipeline Biologics Ideation and Selection                       Undertake continued monitering and and evaluation of Biologics products in various technological domains                 Undetake medical scientific and commercial evaluation of the biologics products                 Develop pipeline recommendations based on scientific and business and starategiv rationale                 LIaise with cross functional teams to develop recommendations                 Facilitate pipeline decision making and pipeline choices                           Operational Excellence and Scalability of the Function                       Establish and Improve processes and systems to increase efficiency and scale of Biologics pipeline selection and prioritization                 Emphasis on process automation and digitization of the process and governance                           Financial Modeling and Valuation                       Owning the models for set of assets & strategic action such as In/ Out licensing                 Financial Modeling - Develop and own detailed valuation models for various molecules / technologies that enable critical decisions such as - Pipeline Prioritization, In/Out Licensing, and various startegic actions                 Analog Identification and assessment - Development of financial models and validation based on analog identification and validation of the same                 Assumption Development for Modelling - Work with subject matter experts from various functions and front end teams as well as through analytics develop assumptions and scenarios                 Long Term Forecasting - Understand the therapy area, and predict long term potential of the molecule based on qualitative and quantitative assessment of the molecule/ therapy area                           Integrated Product Strategy                       Integrated biosimilar product strategy.                 Own the definition and update the strategy in alignment with the front end and backend teams.                 Strategy to optimize for various requirements to cover for the widest set of markets such as manufactuing, formulation and presentation, use, launch scenarios, profitability measures etc                 Work with cross functional teams to develop a product road map from inception to commercialization.                 Define & govern critical decision points over product life cycle -development to commercialization & beyond                           Qualification and Experience required.                       MBBS, MD with MBA from a premiere institute preferred.                       Experience :                       Preferred to have 3-5 years of experience in portfolio management/ BD, expected to do hands on work.                 Must have hands on work experience or knack for financial modeling and Strong analytical approach                 Proficency in MS Excel, Powerpoint is a must                  SQL and Database Development and Management / Advanced analytics experience is preferred                           Business Understanding                        Working knowledge of Biologic business and development                 Knowledge of healthcare databases, routine financial reporting, and strong ability to handle analytical data

column2: What is the job like : As an Analytics Lead, your goal would be to drive strategy and growth sustainably alongside the business and technology leaders by leveraging data-driven actionable insights, translate them across functions and empowering individuals and teams to contribute in an effective and focused manner. You'd be laying the foundation for a strong data function within the organisation by championing a data-driven approach towards problem solving, while prioritizing initiatives through a lens of potential business-impact and equipping other leaders with measurable and trackable performance indicators With an onus to bring objectivity to brainstorming discussions, you shall occupy a seat the table alongside the decision makers of the respective business to vet high-impact initiatives - validating with empirical data / forecasting models / industry research and benchmarking  As a sponsor of first principles thinking, your role as a thought leader would be to define clear problem statements for business and technology functions, collaborate with stakeholders across functions to design solutions and models that are empathetic to user personas and adaptable to evolving industry dynamics An imperative part of your role would be to ensure that this data-first approach permeates through all aspects of the business - ad products' UI / UX enhancement, marketing strategies, user profiling and funnel optimization, data visualization tooling and interfaces, algorithm architecture to name a few Documentation routines around processes, best practices, retrospective analyses alongside standard visualizations would form a core part of your responsibility to ensure smooth upsizing of the team and succession planning at various levels within the vertical Team building and leadership: hire and manage a team of analysts and senior analysts, providing guidance, mentoring, and fostering a collaborative and innovative work environment. Set clear objectives, conduct performance evaluations, and identify opportunities for professional development  Data Architecture and Visualization: Lead data instrumentation with a long-term vision in alignment with industry standards and business goals, maintaining competitiveness and respecting cost considerations Empower consumers of data with ingestible data views, balancing flexibility with complexity and conducting regular clean-ups to avoid clutter Yield Enhancement Strategies: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop and execute strategies aimed at increasing ad yield. This may involve adjusting bidding strategies, optimizing ad placements, and refining targeting parameters. Performance Marketing Analytics : Design and define key metrics across various sub-functions, create standard visualizations for routine monitoring, set up meaningful and actionable alerts in place, develop and circulate weekly, monthly, quarterly performance reports while highlighting key changes w.r.t. the durations Dedicate efforts towards yield optimization, with a focus on upholding user delight. Empower client success teams and media buyers with performance benchmarks, minimum viable thresholds while indicating at-risk accounts on both ends Utilize statistical analyses towards modeling user profiles, conduct correlation and regression analyses to propose meaningful A/B tests, drive marketing strategies based on statistically significant results Business health reporting: Consolidate business goals into meaningful executive-level metrics - share regular, concise and consumable reports Qualification and Experience : Bachelor's or Master's degree in a quantitative field such as Business Analytics, Statistics, Mathematics, Economics Extensive experience in business analytics, preferably in the Adtech industry, with a focus on performance marketing analytics in a techno- commercial role with about 6-9 years of experience.  Experience in a start-up environment is appreciated Subject matter expertise w.r.t. digital advertising platforms, ad serving technologies, and marketing attribution models, tools and technologies such as Google Analytics, Adobe Analytics, SQL, Tableau, or other similar platforms Disposition to work in an agile fashion with a bias for problem solving, and discernment to prioritize based on business impact Expertise in hypothesis testing, data analysis, statistical modeling, data visualization with large volumes of data Excellent communication skills with the ability to present complex findings in a clear and concise manner Strong business acumen with the knack to translate data insights into actionable recommendations and performance indicators for driving and monitoring business growth If you are a highly analytical professional with a passion for driving data-centric decision-making in the Adtech industry, and you thrive in a fast- paced, collaborative environment, we would love to hear from you. Join our team and play a key role in shaping our performance marketing strategies through advanced analytics and insights. Insights :  Specialty - Contextual Advertising, Advertising, Header Bidding, and Advertising Technology  Must Have : - Candidates from Internet online companies (were full product cycle is online) - Someone from AdTech or who has exigence in Performance Marketing campaigns  - 3+ Years of relevant experience - Previous experience hire and manage a team of analysts and senior analysts, - Tools and Technologies such as Google Analytics, Adobe Analytics, SQL, Tableau, or other similar platforms - Experience in focused on yield optimization/ AB testing / Data and Marketing Analytics  - Strong experience on SQL - Experience in business analytics - Experience in Business Analytics, Data Analytics, Product Analytics, Statistical Problem Solving, Product Strategy, Product Design - Should have worked in Business / Data Analytics - Not Data Science or Data Engineering  - Should have experience in Performance Marketing, Yield optimization's, A/B testing and lead generation.  - Open to work in a hands-on role (IC) and will be developing and building the team at the later stage  - Should have consulting + Product company exp.  - Should have worked in smaller companies which are startup in nature  - Only internet / Online - Business Analytics doing majorly performance marketing analytics Good to Have : - Candidates from Adtech companies or similar domain Location : - Bangalore,Hyderabad,Pune,Mumbai,Navi Mumbai

column2: The Strategy & Consulting Global Network Song Practice| Marketing Transformation| Generative AI Manager Join our team of Marketing Transformation consultants who solve customer facing challenges at clients spanning sales, service and marketing to accelerate business change. Then, this is the right place for you! Welcome to a host of exciting global opportunities within Accenture's Strategy & Consulting Global Network Song practice. The Practice-A Brief Sketch The Strategy & Consulting Global Network Song practice is aligned to the Global Network Song Practice of Accenture and works with clients across their marketing, sales and services functions. As part of the team, you will provide transformation services driven by key offerings like Living Marketing, Connected Commerce and Next-Generation Customer Care. These services help our clients become living businesses by optimizing their marketing, sales and customer service strategy, thereby driving cost reduction, revenue enhancement, customer satisfaction and impacting front end business metrics in a positive manner. The Generative AI Manager (GEN AI) is a mid-level position within the Marketing Transformation offering of S&C GN Song. The individual will be responsible for leading and building the GEN AI offering for S&C GN Song. This role requires strong leadership, consulting, project management, data science and communication skills with a deep understanding of emerging marketing technologies and trends. The key responsibilities will include: Provide thought leadership to develop and execute a strategic roadmap for the implementation of Generative AI solutions that are aligned with business goals. Collaborate closely with clients to understand their requirements, identify opportunities for applying Generative AI, and provide tailored solutions to address their unique challenges Strategize and execute end-to-end generative AI projects right from origination, Go-To-Market (GTM) strategy to the successful delivery of the same. Skilled at generating business opportunities through collaborative efforts with the Sales team When needed, serve as a techno-marketeer and act as a bridge between technical, business and client teams Should have sound knowledge of Marketing domain covering from Brand, Content management, Ad-Tech, Martech, Media and Marketing operations. Demonstrate excellent collaboration skills for effectively conveying technical concepts to business stakeholders and vice versa while reaching an alignment for smooth delivery of the project Possess strong communication and presentation skills, enabling effective client engagement and stakeholder management Provide guidance and mentorship to the team of Generative AI professionals and plan for long-term growth and upskilling Stay on top of the latest Gen AI developments and leveraging the same in client conversations and engagements Drive the ethical and responsible usage of Generative AI, addressing privacy, bias, and fairness concerns Key Skills: Generative AI Expertise, Familiarity with coding languages like Python and AI frameworks and libraries such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, or GPT, Data Analysis and Insights, Digital customer experience, Strategic thinking, Analytical skills, Project Management In addition, in order to excel at the role, you will also need to have Understanding of business dynamics, market trends, and competitive landscapes to align generative AI strategies with broader business objectives, ensuring meaningful digital transformation. Strong project management abilities to oversee generative AI initiatives, managing timelines, budgets, and resources for seamless implementation. Adeptness in leading and inspiring cross-functional teams, fostering collaboration, and driving alignment towards generative AI goals. Ability to analyze extensive datasets, merging them with macroeconomic factors and competitive benchmarks to derive actionable insights for stakeholders. Proficiency in working effectively within a dynamic, fast-paced environment, both offshore and onshore, to meet the demands of generative AI consulting. Strong communication and presentation skills to convey complex AI concepts and strategies effectively to key stakeholders. Skill in handling clients to develop, manage, and deepen relationships with key stakeholders, ensuring successful project outcomes. Leadership qualities combined with problem-solving, organizational, and delegation skills to inspire and nurture team members for peak performance. Proficiency in identifying new opportunities, developing comprehensive solutions, and taking ownership of proposals from inception to completion. Contribution to the development of AI-related offerings, identifying growth areas in skills, platforms, and assets to enhance the brand's generative AI strategy offerings. Read about us. Qualification Your experience counts! MBA from a tier 1 institute with a degree in marketing / data science or statistics. column1: GN - SONG - MT - Data Monetization - Senior Manager
column2: The Strategy & Consulting Global Network Song Practic e | Data Monetization Join our team of Strategy & Consulting Global Network Song who solve customer facing challenges at clients spanning sales, service and marketing to accelerate business change Practice: Strategy & Consulting Global Network Song  I Areas of Work:Marketing Transformation (Data Monetization) | Level: Manager  | Location: Delhi, Mumbai, Gurgaon, Bangalore |  Years of Exp: 12+ years Explore an Exciting Career at Accenture  Are you passionate about scaling businesses using in-depth frameworks and techniques to solve customer facing challenges? Do you want to design, build and implement strategies to enhance business performance? Does working in an inclusive and collaborative environment spark your interest? Then, this is the right place for you! Welcome to a host of exciting global opportunities within Accenture Strategy & Consulting's Customer, Sales & Service practice. The Practice A Brief Sketch The practice is aligned to the Global Network Practice of Accenture and works with clients across their marketing, sales, and services functions. As part of the team, you will provide transformation services driven by key offerings like Living Marketing, Connected Commerce and Next-Generation Customer Care. These services help our clients become living businesses by optimizing their marketing, sales, and customer service strategy, thereby driving cost reduction, revenue enhancement, customer satisfaction and impacting front end business metrics in a positive manner. The Marketing Transformation Manager is a senior-level position within the Marketing transformation vertical of Accenture GN Song. The individual will be responsible for leading and overseeing, strategizing, designing, developing and implementing Data Monetization use cases and strategies that will empower clients to transform the way they deliver value through Data. Bring your best skills forward to excel at the role: As a Data Monetization Manager your core responsibility will be to assist and grow our client portfolio through strategizing and consulting then on various data monetization opportunities and its use cases Always delivering highest service levels, making our clients' life simple, advising them on how to leverage data to meet their KPIs and increase revenue. Setting the right incentives and providing valuable industry understanding and insights You will position CN- Marketing Transformation practice as a strong premium data strategy organization Empower decision makers to execute based on Realistic, Constrained and Actionable insights Strong project management skills. Ability to mobilize and organize across multiple stakeholders (client and internal) and projects Stakeholder management & communication Experience in marketing/selling programmatic digital products, DMP, CDP or comparable SaaS solutions to agencies/trading desks (direct to brand client sales experience is a strong plus) Ability to work with the Capability Network, Market Unit leadership and Advance Analytics teams:Support business development and thought leadership in the data monetization space Communication and Presentation Skills to share the perfect pitch with key stakeholders Client handling skills to develop, manage and deepen relationships with key stakeholders Team building skills to collaborate, work and motivate teams with diverse skills and experience to achieve goals Leadership skills along with strong communication, problem solving, organizational and delegation skills to nurture and inspire team members Engaging with client leadership to collaborate on solutions and approaches that enhance their ability to meet business objectives. You have proven success in following a consultative sales approach on behalf of your clients Data, mobile advertising and/or platform sales experience is a big plus You have very strong and convincing communication & presentation skills that you can adjust to different hierarchy levels You are willing to travel at least 50% of your time Ability to drive the engagement with minimal supervisor involvement and should be able to work independently from onshore/offshore Experience in working with middle to senior management levels within existing organization / client organization Strong communication and presentation Skills to share the perfect pitch with key stakeholders Strong experience in shaping and driving engagements and ability to lead project teams Team building skills to collaborate, work and motivate teams with diverse skills and experience to achieve goals Read about us.

column1: S&C Global Network - AI - Supply Chain Analytics - Manager
column2: Entity :- Accenture Strategy & Consulting Team :- Global Network Data & AI Practice :- Supply Chian Analytics  Title :- I&F Decision Sci Practitioner Manager Job location :- Bangalore/Gurgaon/Hyderabad/ Mumbai Accenture Global Network  - Data & AI practice help our clients grow their business in entirely new ways. Analytics enables our clients to achieve high performance through insights from data - insights that inform better decisions and strengthen customer relationships. From strategy to execution, Accenture works with organizations to develop analytic capabilities - from accessing and reporting on data to predictive modelling - to outperform the competition As part of our Data & AI practice, you will join a worldwide network of smart and driven colleagues experienced in leading AI/ML/Statistical tools, methods and applications. From data to analytics and insights to actions, our forward-thinking consultants provide analytically-informed, issue-based insights at scale to help our clients improve outcomes and achieve high performance. Job Description The ideal candidate shall be, An expert in Supply chain/ manufacturing operations domain and Data Science skills. Responsible to solution architect, design, build, deploy, deliver, and monitor advanced analytics models for supply chain planning/operations analytics solutions areas such as asset reliability and maintenance, supply, procurement, inventory, spares, quality analytics, process analytics, simulation and mathematical optimization, demand, etc. planning. Interface with clients to understand engineering/business problems and translate it into analytics problems that shall deliver insights for action and operational improvements. Take initiatives and collaborate with different Accenture internal teams and support driving sales. Provide innovation and thought leadership support to build key capability areas such as tools & technology, new solutions in supply chain planning and assets & accelerators development. Qualification Experience and Education: A minimum 9+ years of experience in industrial/manufacturing/consulting or related areas is needed with at least 5 years of supply chain/ manufacturing/ production advanced analytics solutions design and delivery experience. Good to have global client experiences.  Ideal candidates should have a bachelor's degree preferably in Industrial/ Production/ Statistics/ Economics etc. and master's degree in Statistics/ Economics/ Operations Management/ Supply Chain/ Data Science, etc. Certifications in any one or two of the areas will be an added advantage:Python, AI/ML, Optimization, Simulation, any of the cloud platforms (Azure/ GCP/ AWS). Mandatory Skills: Must have: Good understanding of overall supply chain planning and operations of any of the industries (CPG, Life sciences, Pharma, Industrial, Resources) and connect it with analytics solutions. Deep understanding of advanced analytics solutions descriptive, diagnostic, predictive, prescriptive, and generative and hands-on experience in building models using machine learning, deep learning, Gen AI models. Strong experience in any one or two of the supply chain functions demand planning, inventory planning, S&OP, logistics planning, etc. Hands-on programming experience with any of the analytics tools, data bases and visualization tools and platforms (Python, PySpark, SQL, Bigdata tools, PowerBI/ Tableau). Strong written and oral communication skills. Good to have: SME in one or more of the supply chain functions Visualization packages like Tableau/ Power BI Exposure to tools like BY/ Anaplan/ o9/ Kinaxis /SAP IBP Experience in live data streaming and data ingestion tools.
column11: supply chain, demand planning, data science, manufacturing operations, inventory planning, advanced analytics, logistics planning, python, production, power bi, sales and operations planning, artificial intelligence, industrial, ops, gcp, manufacturing, big data

column1: GN - SC&O - S&P - CLM - Senior Manager
column2: Sourcing and Procurement Manager/Senior Manager -  Supply Chain Management Find endless opportunities to solve our clients' toughest challenges, as you work with exceptional people, the latest tech and leading companies across industries. Practice:  Supply Chain and Operations, Industry Consulting, Global Network I  Areas of Work:  Contract Lifecyle Management, Sourcing and Procurement ,  Supply Chain Management |  Level:Manager/ Senior Manager  |  Location: Gurgaon, Delhi, Mumbai, Bangalore |  Years of Exp: 8+ years Explore an Exciting Career at Accenture Are you an outcome-oriented problem solver? Do you enjoy working on transformation strategies for global clients? Does working in an inclusive and collaborative environment spark your interest? Then, is the right place for you to explore limitless possibilities. As a part of our practice, you will help organizations reimagine and transform their supply chains for tomorrow-with a positive impact on the business, society and the planet. Together, let's innovate, build competitive advantage, improve business, and societal outcomes, in an ever-changing, ever-challenging world. Help us make supply chains work better, faster, and be more resilient, with the following initiatives: Deliver contracting, sourcing and procurement engagements  in the areas of contract lifecycle management, strategic cost reduction, sourcing optimization, procurement transformation, intelligent procurement using tools such as Ariba, Coupa, IVALUA, Zycus and Jaggaer, responsible and resilient procurement, contract life cycle management using Icertis, mergers and acquisitions for clients, across industries and geographies. Key activities including but not limited to- Design Contract lifecycle management operating model including organization structure, processes & technology enablers Identify, evaluate and prioritize sourcing opportunities  through in-depth spend analysis, market research, and so on. Support execution of various stages  of strategic cost reduction, zero based budgeting and operations value transformation programs. Support implementation of procurement solutions including requirements gathering, technical design definition, define test scenarios & scripts  to ensure that the configured solution meets clients' requirements and be comfortable working with application developers & managing multiple stakeholders Design sourcing and procurement operating model  including organisation structure, processes & technology enablers aligned to traditional & emerging business priorities such as responsible sourcing principles, net zero emission targets etc Define and execute sourcing optimization initiatives  such as indirect sourcing and cost take-out, direct sourcing and should-cost modeling, category management, and so on.  Support in business development activities  such as responding to proposal requests, conducting roadshows/demos, staffing management, people engagement, asset development and so on. Bring your best skills forward to excel in the role: Ability to define and implement contracting & procurement operating models  impacting procurement organization, processes & technology landscape Ability to define and execute end-to-end sourcing & procurement processes including  category management & procurement analytics, supplier management, sourcing, contracts & order/goods receipt/invoice management Ability to develop business case for procurement transformation initiatives such as  implementation of source-to-pay & CLM solutions (eg Ariba, Coupa, Ivalua, Zycus, Jaggaer, Icertis and so on), operating model changes etc Excellent data analytics and data interpretation and presentation skills Ability to solve complex business problems  and deliver client delight Excellent communication, interpersonal and presentation skills  Cross-cultural competence  with an ability to thrive in a dynamic environment Read more about us. Qualification Your experience counts! MBA from Tier-1 B Schools and BE/BTech from Tier-1 engineering institutes Good understanding of sourcing and procurement fundamentals coupled with 8+ years of consulting and industry experience in sourcing and procurement across one or more of the following:Contract lifecycle management, strategic cost reduction, sourcing optimization, procurement transformation including implementation of procurement solutions, intelligent procurement, responsible and resilient procurement, mergers and acquisitions Experience with digital sourcing and procurement solutions such as Icertis, Ariba, Coupa, IVALUA, Zycus, Jaggaer, GEP and so on - either in implementations or as an end user Experience in a consulting firm and global exposure is desirable Knowledge of business intelligence tools such as PowerBI, Tableau and SQL, would be an additional advantage Preferred Icertis Practitioner and Icertis Administrator certification Hands-on experience with implementing Icertis & other Contract Lifecycle Management tools across different CLM roles like End user, User administrator etc. Prior exposure to requirements gathering, functional design, system configuration and support to contract management team Understanding of creating workflows, templates, and clause libraries Contribute to CLM product roadmap through active feedback from clients and implementation experience What's in it for you? column2: Role & responsibilities  Analytical Skills: The ability to analyze data, identify trends, and draw meaningful insights is crucial for an MIS Executive. This includes proficiency in tools like Excel, SWOT Analysis, SAC Cloud Software, SAP_ Analytical Tool MIS Reporting and Analysis and possibly more specialized BI (Business Intelligence) tools. Production/Inventory : Should be able to work with Inventory and prodution team to ensure invoice generation, stock management etc... Technical Proficiency: Strong proficiency in relevant software and tools used for data management and reporting is essential. This may include Excel, SQL, Tableau, Power BI, etc. Familiarity with database management systems may also be necessary. Data Management: Knowledge of how to collect, organize, and manage large volumes of data efficiently is crucial. This includes data cleansing, validation, and transformation. Attention to Detail: MIS Executives deal with large datasets, and accuracy is paramount. Small errors in data can lead to incorrect conclusions and decisions. Problem-Solving Skills: The ability to identify and rectify data-related issues or discrepancies is important. This may involve debugging queries, finding patterns in data, or troubleshooting software. Communication Skills: An MIS Executive often needs to communicate complex data insights to non-technical stakeholders. The ability to present information in a clear and understandable way is vital. Time Management: Prioritizing tasks, meeting deadlines, and managing workload efficiently is important in a role that often involves handling multiple projects simultaneously. Business Acumen: Understanding the business context in which the MIS is being used is crucial. This allows the executive to focus on the most relevant data and provide insights that are aligned with organizational goals. Domain Knowledge: Familiarity with the FMCG industry or sector can be beneficial. It helps in contextualizing data and understanding specific requirements.
column11: BI analysis, Business Intelligence, SAP Analytical, Power BI, Analysis, Tableau, MIS Reporting

column2: Reporting to the Data Analysis and Visualization Manager, the Program Manager for Data and Visualization position will be based remotely or in one of Viamo s operating countries     This position might require travel to project sites     Your role is to manage the quality, generate reports and dashboards as well as develop best practices and templates for Program Managers in the Implementation team to use for their reporting needs     You will be a main focal point and oversee relevant strategic initiatives for data and reporting for all Implementation hubs             Key Responsibilities     Project Implementation         Lead data and reporting portion of project implementation for the Implementation team     Advise and recommend Program Managers to apply best practices to optimize mobile content for data reporting purposes      Assist Program Managers in content building to best suit reporting needs; including tree tagging best practices by product             Dashboard Development          Good to excellent understanding of the Viamo platform and database, with a particular advanced understanding of the advanced reporting app, including the engagement and contact reports and how to integrate them using Big Query     Create visualizations of data including reports and dashboards     Work closely with Viamo s Data and Insights crew towards strengthening Viamo s data visualization and presentation offerings             Data Analysis          Help Program Managers unearth insights and interpret trends in complex datasets for our clients by analyzing data and creating reports using Excel. An ability to pull insights from the data is a must.      Analyze user data using statistical techniques to generate cross-project insights that answer business problems, especially those centered around improving the user experience and impact     Advanced knowledge of any (or multiple) software for data analytics and visualization (Tableau, Power BI, Google Data Studio, STATA) for dashboard visualizations             Best Practices and Reporting Templates Development          Work closely with Program Managers to design experiments, learning pilots and A/B tests templates to ensure data is correctly collected in a timely, uniform, and analyzable way and to achieve maximum understanding of data collected by Viamo      Work closely with the project delivery unit to develop reusable reporting templates and best practices (multi product, single variate, multiple variate ) for Implementation reporting: narrative reports templates, inception and project close-out reports, standardize reporting templates for multi-product projects, best practices SOPs, A/B tests templates     Develop a bank of data knowledge from past projects (trends, region-wise data )              Troubleshooting          Identify bugs and unexpected behavior related to Viamo s reporting tools; proactively and clearly report these to Viamo s technical support team             Key Performance Indicators          Customer Satisfaction Survey (CSAT) - Internal      Quality Issues     Resolution SLA %     Delays      Achievement of Learning and Development Target          Team and Reporting Structure         Reports to the Director of Support Services     Works closely with Delivery Program Managers and the Data and Insights Crew          Profile     Required         Over 3 years of experience working as a data analyst/ data scientist     Experience working remotely      Expertise in database management languages (MySQL, BigQuery Standard SQL, etc)      Experience in dashboarding software (Google Data Studio, Tableau, PowerBI etc)     Advanced skills in Excel     Experience working with user engagement data     Expertise in analytical analysis - Cross-tabular analysis, multiple variables analysis etc      Strong technical problem solving skills, proven ability to troubleshoot and debug      Strong communication skills with technical and non-technical team members      Experience of coaching teams in best practices in approaches and methodologies in data science     A proven ability to systematically approach tasks and to manage multiple, at times changing priorities and expectations          Desirable         Degree in computer science, data science, or similar      Experience using a data visualization tool to prototype dashboards     Experience of AWS and Google Cloud Platform infrastructure     Experience using STATA/SPSS/SAS preferred     Experience of working with a data warehouse solution (eg. BigQuery, Redshift, Snowflake etc)
