column2: You will join a highly effective team that provides you with unparalleled hands-on exposure to the Impact Investing and Social Finance space      You thrive in tackling development issues and excel in creating solutions using structured strategies and unprecedented programs that address and solve the world s most pressing problems, from food security to inclusive finance to clean energy      You aim to become a global development leader who has a passion for international development and to get involved in work that makes a difference      When you join IIX, you embark on a rewarding career where we are heavily invested in your professional development, as we will build on your strengths and help you gain new skills with training, coaching, encouragement, and guiding you in the right direction      It is a valuable addition to advance your career, providing you invaluable exposure to the rapidly growing impact investing space          Thus, as a successful team member, you should be a PREM:                                Passionate          Commitment to social finance and impact investing as a path to unlock society's potential to effect social change is essential for a happy and successful tenure at IIX.          Resilient:          Similar to our enterprises working in emerging markets, our IIX team members have strong mental and emotional fortitude and can recover quickly from difficulties or setbacks      We look for people with an adaptable and positive attitude and a strong sense of self-worth, which enables them to move forward and continue to strive for their goals even in the face of adversity          Equitable:          At IIX, we manage toward impact maximization and produce measurable and transparent returns - both social and financial      These results strengthen the ecosystem and transform existing realities by helping impact enterprises magnify their impact and scale      We are fair and impartial in our actions and ensure that we make objective and unbiased decisions based on facts and impact          Maverick:          While IIX is a seasoned stakeholder in the impact enterprise and impact investing space in Asia, we pride ourselves on creating new opportunities      We look for people with an independent and unorthodox approach to thinking and behaving      If you are someone who is non-conformist, innovative, and independent, often going against the grain, does not like following the crowd, and is not afraid to express your own opinions, we want you              Duties and Responsibilities:              IIX is looking to expand our team and bring on board dynamic individuals who are excellent communicators, critical thinkers, and effective doers who naturally build relationships that lead to results      IIX is seeking a mission-driven, results-oriented, and resourceful Monitoring and Evaluation Manager who is a communicator, a thinker, a problem solver, and a doer who naturally builds relationships that lead to results      We are looking for individuals with a strong experience and specialization in gender equality and women empowerment work given the core focus of IIX in gender-lens investing initiatives      You will be able to transition seamlessly from managing external relationships (with donors/clients/investors/INGOs) and conducting impact assessments and reporting for new and existing initiatives      We have a small and energetic team, and this is a roll-up-your-sleeves kind of role      We want someone who first and foremost has a positive attitude      In addition, you are creative, a problem solver, who knows how to push the envelope, and an incredibly fast learner      The role will have Monitoring and Evaluation (ME) and gender-lens experience and is a proven leader with an eye for detail and a desire to make a difference      The successful candidate must be an excellent writer, a critical thinker, and an energetic team player      The candidate will be involved in IIX s ME and/or impact assessment projects and will contribute to the technical content and design of new programs, particularly related to gender-related initiatives      The candidate has to be comfortable with IIX ESG and Impact Assessment platform, IIX Values      Values is the key tool for all of IIX s impact assessment and ESG work      The candidate will be a proactive member of a high-performing team that together is responsible for meeting mission and partnership management goals      The offer for the role will be commensurate with experience      The potential candidate must have field experience related to the subject          Key Responsibilities:          At least 8+ years of relevant work experience.      International development experience: Experience working in or with an internationally focused foundation, corporate foundation, non-profit, or bilateral or multilateral donor;      Sustainability/ESG consulting experience: Experience working in an internationally focussed consulting/advisory organization or Monitoring and evaluation experience to expand that experience to ESG and Impact Assessment      Comfortable with using technology-based tools like IIX Values      Working experience with measuring impact assessment in emerging markets and familiarity with the existing impact measurement metrics like IRIS and SROI.      Understanding of ME and/or ESG key concepts and methodologies, including Theory of Change/Logical framework, KPIs, data collection tools, etc      Demonstrated technical expertise and professional experience working in one of IIX s five priority sectors: energy, agriculture, water, health, and education.      Field-level development work experience, preferably in Asia and the Pacific.              Skills and Qualifications:          Ability to conduct Social Return on Investment analysis; familiarity with Sustainable Debt standards (or ESG standards, UN SDGs, etc is a plus      Professional communication skills in English; additional languages highly desirable.      Desire to work in a collaborative, high-performing team environment, building relationships with other team members and managing a range of responsibilities.      A team player, with a passion for entrepreneurship and market-based solutions to poverty, and an understanding of the challenges of investing in the markets we serve.      Positive and self-motivated attitude.      Experienced and comfortable working in Word, Powerpoint, Excel (ability to use formulas), MEL related tools including IIX Values.      Ability to write reports on impact performance, stories from the field, etc      Understanding of finance and investment is a major plus      Meticulous, organized and excellent attention to detail;              Preferred:          Passion in the impact investment space.      Some work experience in the region      Fluency or proficiency in one or more regional languages      Having worked or studied overseas will be an advantage.

column2: The Investment Data Operations (IDO) team resides within the middle office and is responsible for managing critical data processes and providing high data quality that supports the investment management business     Connor, Clark & Lunn Financial Group Ltd     (CCLFG) manages a wide range of global assets and heavily relies on the output of the IDO team for a variety of functions including portfolio management, risk management, post trade analytics, and compliance     This is a fantastic opportunity to be part of a dynamic and strategic team whose scope and importance continues to grow     We are a solution orientated and collaborative team seeking a likeminded individual who thrives in a challenging and dynamic environment     We place a high value on maintaining an entrepreneurial spirit and creating a culture where each of us have opportunities to succeed     This is a Gurugram based role, which offers flexibility between working from home and the office         What You Will Do           You will play a leadership role in driving daily operational excellence while also embedding a culture of continuous improvement with the goal of improving business outcomes     You will have the opportunity to work closely with multiple business partners including portfolio managers, information systems, other operations teams, and external service providers     The IDO team works with a variety of business applications and technologies to carry out data and process management activities             Key responsibilities include   :            Recruit, motivate, and develop Gurugram staff into a high performing team that provides accurate, timely, and trusted data. This role reports to a Senior Manager, located in Vancouver Canada.     Define and be accountable for operational processes that achieve business objectives.     Provide leadership and support for data operations including handling issue escalations, operational problem solving, risk identification and mitigation, and stakeholder communications.     Take a proactive approach to ensure the reliability of data processes and data quality checks, redesigning workflows as required.     Work with business and technology teams to define and implement process improvements.     Support the Senior Manager, to implement aspects of a multi-year Modern Data Platform initiative and other projects as required.         What You and Your Team Will Do           Security Master:    Maintain and validate accuracy of equity/fixed income/derivative data across multiple systems/databases to enable Investment Manager modeling, trading, and risk monitoring.       Process Manager:    Manage and enable a myriad of scheduled processes for vendor systems, internal and market data transfers, valuation, and benchmarking data inputs to the investment process.       Data Quality:    Deliver timely data signoffs to investment teams; develop and analyze data-quality exceptions and ensure timely resolution.       Stakeholder Service:    Provide analysis on operational needs, ad-hoc data/data-history requests for multiple business partners to support pre- and post-trade portfolio management functions.       Process Improvement:    Identify process/workflow improvements to increase operational efficiency, mitigate risk, improve data-quality, and increase service levels provided to stakeholders.       Support    other operational or engineering staff, senior or managers on a variety of ad-hoc tasks and projects.         What You Bring           Passion for Operational Excellence    you have an approach and track record in achieving operational excellence where accuracy, timeliness, and expertise are critical success factors.        Experience Managing Teams    you have experience building, managing, and developing high performing teams in complex environments responsible for mission critical processes.        Proactive Problem Solver    you possess an analytical mindset to methodically solve problems and detect patterns to prevent recurrences.       Collaborative and Accountable    you have a collaborative spirit that helps you to work well with others while demonstrating a high degree of ownership for your responsibilities.       Continuous Process Improvement Mindset    you constantly take a critical eye to processes with the goal of finding improvement opportunities and bring an ability to manage multiple projects.        Effective Communicator    you communicate effectively (verbal and written) to meet objectives.          This is best achieved by:           A High-Quality Environment   : To work with people who we hold in high regard; to enjoy the time that we spend at work; to focus on productive activities without the distraction of politics and bureaucracy; to treat each other with respect.       An Opportunity to Succeed:    To do work that has value and which presents the opportunity for professional growth and development.       Recognition and Reward   : To recognize each person s contribution and to align compensation with contribution

column2: JD MELs Manager/ Manager - Monitoring and Evaluation - ASME India Private Limited (AIPL) with its office located in the National Capital Region, is a wholly owned subsidiary of ASME (The American Society of Mechanical Engineers) holdings, AIPL renders market access & promotion of the ASMEs global initiatives meant for engineers practicing in profession and Students of engineering & Research. AIPL acts as a bridge to provide last mile connectivity to ASMEs thousands of professional and student members across the country. AIPL is looking for a Manager- Monitoring, Evaluation and Learning Systems for its Philanthropic initiatives in the engineering space. This employment opportunity is located in India for resident Indians only. The role functions as an individual contributor and does not manage any direct reports.   POSITION SUMMARY   MELs Manager:  will be responsible for designing and implementing systems to monitor and evaluate the effectiveness and impact of programs, projects, and organizations. The role will focus on gathering visualization and analysis of data to harness meaningful interpretation for assessment of project/program performance, identify areas for improvement, and facilitate organizational learning   PRINCIPAL ACCOUNTABILITIES   Designing a MELs Framework:   To develop and implement monitoring, evaluation, and learning frameworks that align with the organization's goals and objectives.  To design data collection methodologies, evaluation tools, and performance indicators to measure project / program outcome and impact.   Monitoring and Data Collection:  To oversee the collection, analysis, and interpretation of data related to program or project performance.  To ensure that data is regularly collected, verified, and reported accurately and in line with ASME?? existing systems and protocol. To establish monitoring systems when required.   Evaluation and Impact Assessment:  To conduct evaluation to assess the effectiveness, efficiency, and impact of programs or projects.  To coordinate evaluation activities, such as surveys, interviews, and focus groups, and analyze the findings to provide recommendations for improvement.   Learning and Knowledge Management:  To facilitate organizational learning by disseminating evaluation of findings and lessons learned to relevant stakeholders.  promote a culture of learning, document best practices, and develop knowledge management systems to ensure that insights are shared and integrated into future planning and decision-making processes.  Capacity Building and Training: To provide training and support to staff and partners on MEL concepts, tools, and methodologies.  To build the capacity of P&P team members to effectively collect, analyze, and use data for decision-making and continuous improvement.   Collaboration and Reporting:  The MEL Manager collaborates with internal teams and external stakeholders to ensure that MEL activities align with organizational priorities. They prepare and present reports on MEL findings, progress, and recommendations to inform decision-making at different levels.   Quality Assurance : The MEL Manager ensures the quality and integrity of MEL data and processes by implementing data validation and quality control measures. They identify gaps in data collection or analysis and take corrective actions to ensure data accuracy and reliability.   Stay Updated with MEL Practices:  The MEL Manager stays informed about emerging trends,  methodologies, and best practices in the field of monitoring, evaluation, and learning. They participate in professional networks, attend relevant workshops or conferences, and continuously improve their knowledge and skills.   KEY QUALIFICATIONS   Core Skills   Excellent data management and analytic skills,,power BI, MS SQL Server, Excel, and, VBA, Macro, Tableau, etc.  Excellent English communication  Knowledge f Statistics (Descriptive and analytical)  Creative thinking and critical thinking abilities  Skills in data story-telling to articulate learnings in an effective way.  Interpersonal & Communication Skills  Conflict Resolution, Active Listening,  Inter-personal skills   Professional qualifications   Bachelors in statistics/social sciences with more than 7 years' experience in a similar role with a NGO/INGO/ CSR  Masters in Statistics/social sciences/ social work with Experience of 5+ years in a similar role with an NGO/INGO/CSR.  We are an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment and will not be discriminated against based on race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, national origin, age, disability, or protected veteran status. ASME India Private Limited takes affirmative action in support of its policy to advance in employment individuals who are minorities, women, protected veterans, and individuals with disabilities.   Only those candidates selected for further consideration will be contacted.

column2: This individual is responsible for managing the Business Analytics practice for Marketing function at Saks India. The role will directly serve Saks Marketing/Media leaders through executive reporting, insight generation and ad hoc analysis to solve business problems. The role will report directly to Director - Marketing Analytics in India and communicate with senior leaders in the Business Units across geographies. This managerial role is key in building the Business Analytics team and will serve as a liaison between the North American Analytics and India Analytics teams. Support areas will span Executive Reporting, Customer KPI Dashboard, International Sales Analyses, Segmentation and CRM, Analytics Production Support, Acquisition Retention strategies, Loyalty program and more.     In this role, the manager will be responsible for idea generation, roadmap management and driving cross business unit efficiencies. The manager will play a key role in building out the Analytics Tech roadmap as it relates to automating the existing reporting, new data exploration as needed and operationalizing customer facing marketing programs. He/She would be creating longitudinal behavior data stores for customers and act as the analytics expert behind Saks#39;s   Omni channel data architecture.       The Business Analytics team will focus on providing best in-class support to multiple   stakeholder groups by analyzing gaps/opportunities, managing priorities through effective   communication and business benefit estimation. The team will also need to be familiar with a   wide range of tech stack to effectively leverage all critical data sources.                 As the manager, Business Analytics, you will:           Manage groups of data analytics professionals that use business data and statistical methods to provide insight into business performance. Suggest improvement areas and methods to drive top line growth. Implement analytical approaches, methodologies to assist in the interpretation of results. Create effective presentations/reports to management for decision making and strategic planning.     The Business Analytics practice at Saks India would have two internal functions - Business Intelligence Business Insights.You will develop these capabilities by building high performing teams, continue to support as a technical mentor on the architecture/design for reporting frameworks, with an objective to deliver error free, timely, actionable intelligence into business performance. You, along with the team will be responsible for       Creating end-to-end automated reporting capabilities, including supporting data engineering needs required for intermediary data transformations, creation of automation frameworks to run these regular reporting initiatives with zero manual intervention.   Become subject matter experts on a variety of data types, specializing in querying data from disparate data sources and relational databases     Develop dynamic, self-serve, near real time dashboards on data visualization tools like Tableau, Looker etc. The analysts in this team would be dashboard developers, with strong SQL expertise backed with programming on python/pyspark for automation.   Participate in the strategic development of system capabilities within business analytics teams including bespoke analyses to support variety of business stakeholders such as loyalty, promotions, omni channel customer journeys and business operations   Support Director of Business Analytics through ownership of specific stakeholder relationships and company goals   Develop fact-based strategic and tactical business plans for proofs of concept /presentations for leadership on key strategic marketing initiatives   Analyze business performance proactively, compare market trends and explore key opportunity areas for the business to focus on. The team would support ad-hoc analysisrequired by senior management by providing data backed business insights. Along with the SQL expertise, the analysts in this team would have an eye for detail, story telling thought process etc.         Who You Are:         A Masters / Bachelor#39;s degree with a minimum of 8 years of experience, preferably in Business Intelligence or a quantitative field like Information Science, Mathematics or Statistics.   5-7 years of experience into ecommerce B2C retail analytics domain, Fashion-retail is a plus       3-4 years#39; experience in marketing analytics, reporting insights, ad hoc analysis, data mining, data storytelling, data sciences, statistical analysis etc   4+ years managing people both individual contributors and teams / projects.   Hands on experience with a high-level programming language (e.g. Python, VB, etc..) and familiarity with Snowflake, Hive/Hadoop environments for data and proven ability to drive efficiencies through automation using Airflow or similar   Strong technical proficiency with Looker or Tableau or other business intelligence tools.   Working experience with Jira/project management set up       Strong attention to detail, willingness to wear multiple hats, building and tracking a work plan in a fast-paced environment and drive efficiencies to execute multiple projects simultaneously   Self-driven, curiosity and initiative, building and enriching new, rapidly growing tools insights.   Inquisitive thinker, with the ability to continuously iterate in processes and effective in collaboration across cross-functional teams               Job Qualifications        You also have:         Lead multiple functions within purview of Reporting and Analytics including but not limited to Executive Reporting, Adhoc analysis, CRM, Loyalty, Personalization, Promotions   Subject matter expertise on All Data / Database technologies including Data Engineering and Analytics Technology   Thought partnership for North American Analytics teams on Business Analytics and Analytics Automation     Managed a team of analysts /senior analysts responsible for individual projects   Built new analytic capabilities for Saks by translating business needs into analytic problems and seeking out the data necessary through internal and external partnerships   Identified and driven strategic priorities and provides best in-class support to Analytics teams by managing priorities through effective communication and business benefit estimation   Defined team vision and orchestrates projects, processes and cross-functional task forces to deliver meaningful outcomes in a global delivery setting   Prepared and delivered executive ready presentations highlighting insights and recommendations   Excellent communication and presentation skills with the ability to translate complex data insights into actionable recommendations.         How Often You May Travel:         As per business requirement         Your Life and Career at Saks:           Be a part of a world-class team; work with an adventurous spirit; think and act like an owner- operator!   Exposure to rewarding career advancement opportunities, from retail to supply chain, to digital or corporate.   A culture that promotes a healthy, fulfilling work/life balance     Thank you for your interest in Saks. We look forward to reviewing your application.                   Thank you for your interest in Saks. We look forward to reviewing your application.         Saks provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability          Saks welcomes all applicants for this position. Should you be individually selected to participate in an assessment or selection process, accommodations are available upon request in relation to the materials or processes to be used.

column2: The Assistant Manager Consumer Engagement Analytics Reporting is responsible for End-to-end execution for delivering analytical insights, enabling them to make fact-based decisions to achieved business targets.                                      Based on multiple data sources, the role generates insights, reports dashboards and oversees performance of campaigns that help adidas India team to understand members behaviour and related business performance to ultimately help drive sales.                                      The role will work in a fast-paced, international, and highly strategic environment with many opportunities to develop and to gain exposure.                                     Success will rely on the ability to bring in new ideas to continuously evolve and adapt, strengthening performance ensuring business goals.                                           Key Responsibilities                                         CRM calendar execution through comms briefing, approval, and scheduling in close collaboration with external local agencies via special digital platforms.                                  Rigid following of briefing SLA set by the agencies.                                  Comms include e-mails, push notifications, SMSs and WA messages.                                   Monthly CRM reporting including KPI s tracking, analysis of channels particular comms performance, highlights/lowlights, and corrective action plan (if necessary).                                     Managing of specific CRM projects (new roll out, optimizations, enhancements etc).                                     Managing CRM budget (agency fees, new roll outs and pilots).                                     Managing external agencies on day-to-day basis and also in the development of new initiatives and tools.                     Develop an overall CRM Strategy in conjunction:                     targets setting (traffic/ revenue web/app) and approval with key stakeholders;                                     global and local initiatives roll outs.                                     Mid-term planning via creating and managing CRM calendar for all digital marketing and retail campaigns across the region. Being flexible enough to accommodate all the changes in the launches or to execute reactive campaigns but still delivering flawlessly execution.                                     Managing relationships with necessary global teams, keeping them regularly informed on the projects (as per established process).                                   Regularly searching for any best practices, latest innovations digital concepts, competitor activity to be integrated whilst remaining consistently abreast of current CRM tools and techniques.                                   Continuously review and report on the efficacy of membership first initiatives such as early access, member exclusive and other member incentives                                         Set up the regular cadence dashboards for Leadership review to provide clear insights into progress of membership at EM and Country levels                                         Set up regular cadence dashboards for channel level deep dives to constantly iterate and improve the membership proposition                                         Collaborate with Country teams to set up self-service dash boards to provide membership insights and next steps                                         Establish standard reports for campaign reporting that drive awareness and clear next steps                                          Co-initiate and help implement new reporting structures or refine existing structures within your area of responsibility in alignment with Global Membership Analytics Frameworks and KPI metrics                                         Identify use cases based on membership insights that would benefit the larger organization such as product preferences, product launch calendar, product buy, etc                                         Drive the development of customer segmentations, acquisition and retention strategies, predictive modelling, customer lifetime value metrics and marketing effectiveness measures.                                       Consumer Engagement Reporting and Analytics                                       Work with key technologies (Adobe, GA, MicroStrategy etc) and tools consumer engagement team with .com/app insights on overall consumer funnel and overall digital consumer experience/engagement analytics                                         Lead data lead insights into consumer segmentation and affinity to enable continuous optimization of digital channels to increase reach, engagement, and acquisition.                                         Develop strong relationships with business stakeholders to understand their goals, objectives, outline analytic requirements, provide solutions to business needs and join forces in driving business improvement and onsite optimization.                                         Support industry, market, and global benchmarking.                                         Key Relationships                                 Business Units Brand Activations                                 Concept to Consumer                                         eCommerce                                         Digital Analytics                                         Media                                         Tech                                         DBA                                         Global Membership Team (Strategy, planning and product)                                         Global Digital Analytics                                         EM Membership / CRM                                         Requisite Education And Experience / Minimum Qualifications                                   Bachelors in Engineering / Economics / Mathematics / Statistics /  Commerce/Business                                Masters in English /MBA (Optional)                                      3-5 years progressive experience within data analytics, consumer analytics or data science                                         Knowledge, Skills And Abilities                                         Fast learner, proactive working attitude, and growth mindset                                         Experience in conceptualizing and executing reports and dashboards                                         Data driven and insights focused individual with a pragmatic outlook                                         Demonstrated ability of taking initiative and influencing people                                         Experience in cross-functional and cross-geo stakeholder management.                                         Well versed with key membership indicators, personalization, and insights reporting                                         Proven extensive hands-on experience with analytics tools and BI solutions (e.g. SQL, MicroStrategy, Tableau, and Qualtrics)                          You have experience using the following type of tools and a view on how they would benefit business:                         Web Analytics (e.g. Adobe Analytics, Google Analytics 360)                                         Voice of the Customer tool (e.g. Usabilla)                                         Appsflyer and Personalization Platforms such as Monetate, etc                         Knowledge of any of the below tools are a plus:                         Advanced Analytics Tools (R, Python)                                         Customer Experience Measurement (Tealeaf CEM)                                         Experience in data science project and tools                                         Experience of working with recommendation engines or recommendation engine models would be highly appreciated                                         Fast learner, proactive working attitude, and strong project management experience                                         Excellent project management skills, including the ability to lead projects or work on several projects simultaneously                                         Very good presentation skills, data management and reporting and story-telling.                                         Ability to work in a matrix organization                                         Fluent in English, both verbally and written.                               COURAGE:    Speak up when you see an opportunity; step up when you see a need..           OWNERSHIP:    Pick up the ball. Be proactive, take responsibility and follow-through.           INNOVATION:    Elevate to win. Be curious, test and learn new and better ways of doing things.           TEAMPLAY:    Win together. Work collaboratively and cultivate a shared mindset.           INTEGRITY:    Play by the rules. Hold yourself and others accountable to our company s standards.           RESPECT:    Value all players. Display empathy, be inclusive and show dignity to all

column2: The CSG BI organization is responsible for insights and recommendations to optimize the user experiences of IT applications. This includes analyses focused on application speed, stability, adoption, and user behaviors. Such work includes data ingestion, data munging, statistical analysis, data modelling, model evaluation, and model deployment. Effective outputs require a simple user-friendly synthesis of information, including actionable insights, analytical solutions, and AI-powe'red products.          The team needs individuals with extensive business and analytical knowledge to deliver high value, actionable insights and recommendations. We are looking for a candidate who has a solid background in analytics, demonstrates proven abilities to be innovative and creative, and is an effective collaborator and communicator enabling influence.          The candidate will have excellent analytics capabilities, expertise in analytical problem-solving techniques, project management skills, and product mindset. He/she will have the experience of working on solving complex analytical problems and should be comfortable with analytical tools. The person will be responsible for operating within a dynamic, fast-paced, scalable & agile IT development environment, which faces both internal and external customers.                 Job Responsibilities:               Delivers analytical insights to provide actionable recommendations to influence Online Support product development and to optimize user experience by considering speed, stability, and key user behaviors;             Develops and delivers on analytics roadmap for Online Support, while always identifying new opportunities and prioritization recommendations;             Works with data engineers, data scientists, architects, application product owners, software developers, UX designers, and business partners to design strategic projects and break complex problems into smaller actionable tasks;             Leads cross-functional engagements to define problem statements, establish KPIs, collect data, process data, build analytical models and make recommendations;             Builds Artificial Intelligence/Machine Learning prototypes;             Develops self-service analytics solutions to automate analytics;             Presents findings to key stakeholders;             Collects feedback and improves deployed products;             Establishes relationship with key stakeholders or Point of Contacts to accelerate issue fixes;             Leverages teamwork or cross-functional collaboration to influence the optimization of Online Support;             Contribute to improving business processes and reducing overall issues for Online Support.               Role Requirements:               Excellent written and verbal communication skills, including the ability to convey analytic insights effectively to both IT and business leaders;             Data Analytics, Data Science, Computer Science, Engineering, or Business Degree, or equivalent professional experience;             8+ years of relevant work experience or 6+ years of work experience with a master degree;              6+ years of experience with data analytics, business analytics, or data science;             Hands-on analytics capabilities, expertise in analytical problem-solving techniques and frameworks, and the ability to deal with large volumes of data;             Experience with Python/R and SQL;             Experience with data visualization tools, such as Power BI, Tableau, or Looker;             Knowledge of machine learning algorithms/concepts;             Proficiency in statistics and research methods;             Self-motivated with excellent capability of dealing with ambiguity;             Demonstrated knowledge of project management, leadership/teamwork, and stakeholder/customer management skills, and business acumen;             Comfortable with data cleaning processes to ensure data integrity;             Eager to learn new skills and knowledge and apply new skills and concepts quickly;                   Preferences:                MBA, Engineering or CS Degree from top schools;             Experience with web analytics tools, such as Google Analytics, Adobe Analytics (SiteCatalyst or Omniture), or Coveo             Experience with Oracle RDMBS, Snowflake, BigQuery             Understanding of Tech Support and/or Order Support processes is a plus;             Understanding of AI ML (Machine Learning)             Understanding of data warehousing and ETL is a plus;             Experience with product management is a plus;             Experience in working with global teams;             Candidates may come from different strategy consulting backgrounds- Management Consulting, Digital strategy or eCommerce strategy.

column2: Specific Responsibilities Independently lead the production of Sector Digital Creative Effectiveness reporting for APAC, AMESA, LATAM, Europe, PBNA, PFNA. Support workstream lead in producing the Global Creative Effectiveness TV & Digital reporting, including: Extracting, cleaning, and manipulating large datasets from various sources required for delivery. Collaborating with cross-functional teams, including Insights, Marketing, Media departments; peers, and senior stakeholders in the Global and Sectors, as well as subcontractors (mainly Creative X and Zappi) to gather datasets and inputs required for delivery. Utilizing advanced data processing techniques and data visualization tools to present the reporting in a clear and compelling manner. Generating and validating XLS and PPT reports. Continuously optimizing reporting data processing to enhance efficiency and accuracy. Supporting Sectors on queries, ad-hoc requests, and projects related to creative effectiveness reporting. Co-lead automation of the Creative effectiveness TV & Digital reporting, including: Exploring new automation opportunities with the workstream team. Leading enhancement of the current offline reporting system through further automation leveraging the latest data programming techniques: Developing and implementing new solutions to streamline data extraction, transformation, and visualization processes. Integrating data from multiple sources into automated reporting solutions, ensuring data consistency and reliability. Testing and validating automated reporting processes to ensure accuracy and reliability of output. Monitoring and maintaining the automated reporting system, troubleshooting issues, and implementing enhancements as needed. Supporting the creation of online Creative Effectiveness reporting: Introducing the subcontractor to the current Scorecarding specifications. Providing critical feedback on the front-end prototypes developed by the subcontractor and broader workstream team, covering user experience design, functionality scope, navigation, data extracts content & structure, and enhancing the Scorecards' usability and functionality for both scorecarding and diverse meta-analyses needs. Supporting the broader workstream team on validation of fully automated online reporting. Ensuring seamless transition and continuity of reporting production during the transition process to automation. 3. Co-lead / support ad-hoc projects of Global Brand and Creative Capability team , such as enhancements of the creative effectiveness evaluation protocols and tools, meta-analyses of creative effectiveness, and more. Qualifications Hard Skills & Qualifications 8+ years of FMCG industry experience  (corporate or agency) in market research, consumer insights, analytics, or similar roles, demonstrating success in executing data analytics projects in complex environments. Bachelor's degree  required (Master's is a plus). Knowledge of  statistical methods and techniques  for data analysis. Proficient in  data analysis  and interpretation . Highly proficient in  revealing insights  from data and  crafting compelling narratives  around them. Strong experience in  manipulating large datasets, optimizing data processing and management . Proficient in  data processing & visualization techniques and tools : Advanced user of Excel, PowerPoint, and Power BI incl. Power Query. VBA knowledge is a plus. Understanding of database management systems (MS Access, SQL). Understanding of data programming languages (e.g. Python / R) is a plus. Understanding of data modeling. Ability to create and maintain  complex reports and dashboards . Familiarity with qualitative or quantative consumer and market research methods . It may encompass any of the methods for performance evaluation, post-evaluation, or tracking for such aspects as packaging, pricing, brand equity, products, product pipelines, concepts, advertising. Or, any of the following: exploratory studies; consumer immersions, segmentation studies, volumetrics, shopper decision tree studies, retail audit data analytics, sales focrecasting, etc.. The key outcome of the experience should be a  general understanding of the research concept , what research entails, and  the ability to effectively synthesize and integrate quantitative data with qualitative findings . Extensive experience in  cross-functional collaboration , demonstrating independent leadership and adeptness in processing feedback. Proven track record in  managing senior stakeholders Expertise in developing and implementing  solutions for  automated  data extraction, integration from multiple sources, transformation, and visualization  is a plus. Soft Skills Excellent project management:  Demonstrates effective project management skills, including independent workstreams management, problem-solving, decision-making, and the ability to meet tight deadlines. Attention to detail and execution excellence:  Delivers meticulous precision and unwavering commitment to accuracy, ensuring top-tier quality in reporting and all tasks. Time management and speed:  Efficiently manages time and prioritizes tasks to deliver results promptly and effectively. Solution-oriented problem solver:  Approaches challenges with a proactive, analytical, and solution-focused mindset, leveraging various data sources and collaborating with cross-functional teams independently. Highly organized, responsive, and skilled in multi-tasking:  Capable of simultaneously managing multiple projects, priorities, and stakeholders, while identifying opportunities for process efficiencies (including proactive trade-off management) and improvement. Proactive and independent:  Works autonomously, anticipating future needs and proactively planning and executing tasks without constant supervision. Collaborative team player:  Excels in working with internal stakeholders and external suppliers to achieve project goals. Strong business communication:  Exhibits excellent written and verbal communication skills, articulating complex ideas effectively in a concise and clear manner. Change management proficiency:  Demonstrates strong change management skills, adapting to new tools and processes seamlessly and facilitating training for others. Organizational savvy:  Navigates the organization effectively, influencing and educating stakeholders to ensure alignment and informed decision-making. Stress resistance and emotional intelligence:  Demonstrates resilience in high-pressure situations while exhibiting adeptness in understanding and managing emotions, maintaining composure, and fostering positive relationships in diverse professional settings. Self-motivation:  Maintains self-motivation while proactively driving business objectives forward and actively pursuing self-development.

column2: Title: Sales Ex- Sales Performance & Analysis Manager-Technology Role (Job Profile):Analytics & Modeling Manager Management Level:Manager (ML7)  You are:  Someone who bases stories on evidence with a knack for transforming data into business insights.  You have grit:dead ends do not deter you, rather they're opportunities to apply critical thinking.  You tend to have a few technical skills in your 'bat-belt' and lose track of time when analyzing trends.  You are at your best with lots of data and metrics, doing the dot-connecting and figuring out the 'so what'.  You are confident without being rigid, navigating the business and technical.  You aren't afraid to say I don't know.  You are not a lonely rider:You are part of a global community of Analytics experts exchanging knowledge. The work: You will be a trusted advisor for leadership and enable them with business insights to drive profitable sales growth. Your responsibilities will include: [*] Lead an Analytics team in providing stakeholders with insights on our sales performance & Independently deliver in a global environment. [*] Partner with other Sales Excellence people and with internal clients to confirm business priorities, define success criteria, and measure outcomes. [*] Help evolve Sales Excellence tools and champion their use by leadership and account teams. Here's what you need:  Undergraduate degree or equivalent  English language fluency (oral and written)  A Minimum of 5 years of Analytics work experience in Sales, Pricing, Finance, or related field  Advanced skills in Microsoft Excel and PowerPoint  Intermediate skills in business analytics tools (Qlik, Tableau, or PowerBI)  Experience in analytics in Sales, Pricing, Finance or a related field  Experience working with senior leadership and creating executive-level briefings  Experience managing and motivating a virtual team in a global environment Extra Credits if you have:  Understanding of Accenture sales process & systems, business model  Excellent oral & written communications skills  Accuracy & attention to detail; ability to prioritize own workload and manage downstream stakeholders and resources.  Quality assurance/thoroughness  Ability to work autonomously as a self-starter (see the need before it is known) You May Also Need:  A home office or work area that is suitable for producti Qualification Job Name S&E Finance Technology Manager Level Career Level 7 Workforce Enterprise Job  Summary : Finance Strategy & Enablement (S&E) is a global team within the Finance Corporate Function. The team shapes our Finance Strategy, provides enablement support for the Finance functions, and runs the transformational programs required to achieve the strategic goals. Strategy & Enablement ensures that day-to-day activities across Finance are supported by robust and compliant processes, user centered solutions and application support fundamental to the overall success and transformation of Finance. It also leads a broad range of key programs and change journeys, drives improvements in technology performance and reimagines our processes with the application of new technology in collaboration with CIO. This role is for a Finance Technology Manager who will report to Finance Technology S&E Leadership. The individual in this role will be required to support and manage a portfolio of finance projects for both the business and internal finance teams. Such projects span areas like automation, data architecture, enablement of reporting & analytics, use of artificial intelligence and much more. The Finance technology team supervises a large portfolio of ongoing transformation programs that are each operated by individual teams from Finance, CIO and Accenture Operations and with collaboration with other corporate functions. The role therefore requires a very collaborative individual, who can build relationships as well as operate at both the strategic and tactical level. We are looking for a person with experience from technology projects / implementation in finance domain. The role will involve solving the problems of today and bringing in futuristic thinking for shaping the world of tomorrow. Key Responsibilities:  Support the S&E Finance Technology leadership with execution of Accenture's digital finance transformation priorities.  Support research and delivery of the best technology solutions, ensure progress and quality of projects while addressing any operational challenges and proactively escalating to relevant stakeholders.  Help operationalize working groups on the respective initiatives for effective functioning and delivery of the outcomes.  Support operating/steering committees.  Support review of finance tools and technology to identify improvement opportunities.  Conduct research on new technologies and support future roadmap design, project plans and frameworks.  Work with finance functions to define requirements for new solutions and processes and ensure these are effectively documented and understood by technical delivery teams.  Support content creation for transformation stories. Relationships  Reports to:Finance Technology Deputy Strategy & Enablement.  Relationships: Finance S&E leadership, Finance S&E FPA leads, Finance function leadership, CIO leadership, CDAO leadership, Operations leadership, other corporate function S&E leads. Qualifications  Education:Post-Graduate / M.B.A from premier B School (specialization in Finance or related field)  Work Experience:7 or more years of work experience in FinTech implementation or consulting  Skills: o Collaborative o Ability to operate at both strategic and tactical level o Analytical and structured o Strong presentation skills o Self-starter and result-oriented  Work Requirements: o Since this is a global role, some flexibility in work hours will be required to align with stakeholders in other time zones.

column2: Sourcing and Procurement Manager/Senior Manager -  Supply Chain Management Find endless opportunities to solve our clients' toughest challenges, as you work with exceptional people, the latest tech and leading companies across industries. Practice:  Supply Chain and Operations, Industry Consulting, Global Network I  Areas of Work:  Contract Lifecyle Management, Sourcing and Procurement ,  Supply Chain Management |  Level:Manager/ Senior Manager  |  Location: Gurgaon, Delhi, Mumbai, Bangalore |  Years of Exp: 8+ years Explore an Exciting Career at Accenture Are you an outcome-oriented problem solver? Do you enjoy working on transformation strategies for global clients? Does working in an inclusive and collaborative environment spark your interest? Then, is the right place for you to explore limitless possibilities. As a part of our practice, you will help organizations reimagine and transform their supply chains for tomorrow-with a positive impact on the business, society and the planet. Together, let's innovate, build competitive advantage, improve business, and societal outcomes, in an ever-changing, ever-challenging world. Help us make supply chains work better, faster, and be more resilient, with the following initiatives: Deliver contracting, sourcing and procurement engagements  in the areas of contract lifecycle management, strategic cost reduction, sourcing optimization, procurement transformation, intelligent procurement using tools such as Ariba, Coupa, IVALUA, Zycus and Jaggaer, responsible and resilient procurement, contract life cycle management using Icertis, mergers and acquisitions for clients, across industries and geographies. Key activities including but not limited to- Design Contract lifecycle management operating model including organization structure, processes & technology enablers Identify, evaluate and prioritize sourcing opportunities  through in-depth spend analysis, market research, and so on. Support execution of various stages  of strategic cost reduction, zero based budgeting and operations value transformation programs. Support implementation of procurement solutions including requirements gathering, technical design definition, define test scenarios & scripts  to ensure that the configured solution meets clients' requirements and be comfortable working with application developers & managing multiple stakeholders Design sourcing and procurement operating model  including organisation structure, processes & technology enablers aligned to traditional & emerging business priorities such as responsible sourcing principles, net zero emission targets etc Define and execute sourcing optimization initiatives  such as indirect sourcing and cost take-out, direct sourcing and should-cost modeling, category management, and so on.  Support in business development activities  such as responding to proposal requests, conducting roadshows/demos, staffing management, people engagement, asset development and so on. Bring your best skills forward to excel in the role: Ability to define and implement contracting & procurement operating models  impacting procurement organization, processes & technology landscape Ability to define and execute end-to-end sourcing & procurement processes including  category management & procurement analytics, supplier management, sourcing, contracts & order/goods receipt/invoice management Ability to develop business case for procurement transformation initiatives such as  implementation of source-to-pay & CLM solutions (eg Ariba, Coupa, Ivalua, Zycus, Jaggaer, Icertis and so on), operating model changes etc Excellent data analytics and data interpretation and presentation skills Ability to solve complex business problems  and deliver client delight Excellent communication, interpersonal and presentation skills  Cross-cultural competence  with an ability to thrive in a dynamic environment Read more about us. Qualification Your experience counts! MBA from Tier-1 B Schools and BE/BTech from Tier-1 engineering institutes Good understanding of sourcing and procurement fundamentals coupled with 8+ years of consulting and industry experience in sourcing and procurement across one or more of the following:Contract lifecycle management, strategic cost reduction, sourcing optimization, procurement transformation including implementation of procurement solutions, intelligent procurement, responsible and resilient procurement, mergers and acquisitions Experience with digital sourcing and procurement solutions such as Icertis, Ariba, Coupa, IVALUA, Zycus, Jaggaer, GEP and so on - either in implementations or as an end user Experience in a consulting firm and global exposure is desirable Knowledge of business intelligence tools such as PowerBI, Tableau and SQL, would be an additional advantage Preferred Icertis Practitioner and Icertis Administrator certification Hands-on experience with implementing Icertis & other Contract Lifecycle Management tools across different CLM roles like End user, User administrator etc. Prior exposure to requirements gathering, functional design, system configuration and support to contract management team Understanding of creating workflows, templates, and clause libraries Contribute to CLM product roadmap through active feedback from clients and implementation experience What's in it for you? An opportunity to work on

column2: The role will also involve participation in other workstreams of the Global Brand and Creative Capability team, such as enhancements of the creative effectiveness evaluation protocols and tools, meta-analyses of creative effectiveness, and more.         Responsibilities               Specific Responsibilities                             Independently lead the production of Sector Digital Creative Effectiveness reporting for APAC, AMESA, LATAM, Europe, PBNA, PFNA. Support workstream lead in producing the Global Creative Effectiveness TV & Digital reporting, including:               Extracting, cleaning, and manipulating large datasets from various sources required for delivery.         Collaborating with cross-functional teams, including Insights, Marketing, Media departments; peers, and senior stakeholders in the Global and Sectors, as well as subcontractors (mainly Creative X and Zappi) to gather datasets and inputs required for delivery.         Utilizing advanced data processing techniques and data visualization tools to present the reporting in a clear and compelling manner.         Generating and validating XLS and PPT reports.         Continuously optimizing reporting data processing to enhance efficiency and accuracy.         Supporting Sectors on queries, ad-hoc requests, and projects related to creative effectiveness reporting.                   Co-lead automation of the Creative effectiveness TV & Digital reporting, including:               Exploring new automation opportunities with the workstream team.         Leading enhancement of the current offline reporting system through further automation leveraging the latest data programming techniques:         Developing and implementing new solutions to streamline data extraction, transformation, and visualization processes.         Integrating data from multiple sources into automated reporting solutions, ensuring data consistency and reliability.         Testing and validating automated reporting processes to ensure accuracy and reliability of output.         Monitoring and maintaining the automated reporting system, troubleshooting issues, and implementing enhancements as needed.         Supporting the creation of online Creative Effectiveness reporting:         Introducing the subcontractor to the current Scorecarding specifications.         Providing critical feedback on the front-end prototypes developed by the subcontractor and broader workstream team, covering user experience design, functionality scope, navigation, data extracts content & structure, and enhancing the Scorecards usability and functionality for both scorecarding and diverse meta-analyses needs.         Supporting the broader workstream team on validation of fully automated online reporting.         Ensuring seamless transition and continuity of reporting production during the transition process to automation.                         3. Co-lead / support ad-hoc projects of Global Brand and Creative Capability team   , such as enhancements of the creative effectiveness evaluation protocols and tools, meta-analyses of creative effectiveness, and more.         Qualifications             Hard Skills & Qualifications               8+ years of FMCG industry experience    (corporate or agency) in market research, consumer insights, analytics, or similar roles, demonstrating success in executing data analytics projects in complex environments.           Bachelors degree    required (Masters is a plus).         Knowledge of    statistical methods and techniques    for data analysis.         Proficient in    data analysis     and interpretation   .         Highly proficient in    revealing insights    from data and    crafting compelling narratives    around them.         Strong experience in    manipulating large datasets, optimizing data processing and management   .         Proficient in    data processing & visualization techniques and tools   :         Advanced user of Excel, PowerPoint, and Power BI incl. Power Query. VBA knowledge is a plus.         Understanding of database management systems (MS Access, SQL).         Understanding of data programming languages (e.g. Python / R) is a plus.         Understanding of data modeling.         Ability to create and maintain    complex reports and dashboards   .           Familiarity with qualitative or quantative consumer and market research methods   . It may encompass any of the methods for performance evaluation, post-evaluation, or tracking for such aspects as packaging, pricing, brand equity, products, product pipelines, concepts, advertising. Or, any of the following: exploratory studies; consumer immersions, segmentation studies, volumetrics, shopper decision tree studies, retail audit data analytics, sales focrecasting, etc.. The key outcome of the experience should be a    general understanding of the research concept   , what research entails, and    the ability to effectively synthesize and integrate quantitative data with qualitative findings   .         Extensive experience in    cross-functional collaboration   , demonstrating independent leadership and adeptness in processing feedback.         Proven track record in    managing senior stakeholders             Expertise in developing and implementing    solutions for    automated    data extraction, integration from multiple sources, transformation, and visualization    is a plus.               Soft Skills               Excellent project management:    Demonstrates effective project management skills, including independent workstreams management, problem-solving, decision-making, and the ability to meet tight deadlines.           Attention to detail and execution excellence:    Delivers meticulous precision and unwavering commitment to accuracy, ensuring top-tier quality in reporting and all tasks.           Time management and speed:    Efficiently manages time and prioritizes tasks to deliver results promptly and effectively.           Solution-oriented problem solver:    Approaches challenges with a proactive, analytical, and solution-focused mindset, leveraging various data sources and collaborating with cross-functional teams independently.           Highly organized, responsive, and skilled in multi-tasking:    Capable of simultaneously managing multiple projects, priorities, and stakeholders, while identifying opportunities for process efficiencies (including proactive trade-off management) and improvement.           Proactive and independent:    Works autonomously, anticipating future needs and proactively planning and executing tasks without constant supervision.           Collaborative team player:    Excels in working with internal stakeholders and external suppliers to achieve project goals.           Strong business communication:    Exhibits excellent written and verbal communication skills, articulating complex ideas effectively in a concise and clear manner.           Change management proficiency:    Demonstrates strong change management skills, adapting to new tools and processes seamlessly and facilitating training for others.           Organizational savvy:    Navigates the organization effectively, influencing and educating stakeholders to ensure alignment and informed decision-making.           Stress resistance and emotional intelligence:    Demonstrates resilience in high-pressure situations while exhibiting adeptness in understanding and managing emotions, maintaining composure, and fostering positive relationships in diverse professional settings.             Self-motivation:    Maintains self-motivation while proactively driving business objectives forward and actively pursuing self-development.

column2: AXA XL recognizes digital, data, and information assets are critical for the business, both in terms of managing risk and enabling new business opportunities       Data and Insights should not only be high quality, but also actionable - enabling AXA XL s executive leadership team to maximize benefits and achieve sustained motivated advantage     Our Innovation, Data and Analytics (IDA) function is focused on driving innovation by optimizing how we leverage digital, data, and AI to drive strategy and differentiate ourselves from the competition     As we develop an enterprise-wide data and digital strategy that moves us toward a greater focus on the use of data and strengthening our capabilities, we are seeking a Delivery Lead, Business Intelligence, and Reporting         In this role, you will manage and lead the provision of relevant Business Intelligence that enables the organization with necessary, timely insights to drive business decisions, build our dynamic advantage and help differentiate in the market through faster and better execution            DISCOVER your opportunity                             What will your          essential responsibilities include?                                 Oversee team in design, creation and maintenance of various dashboards delivering critical data insights for the business and ensuring that dashboards use appropriate, up to data sources.                          Own, build and deliver relevant, timely BI Dashboards/reports and insights to enable functions across the insurance value chain.                      Provide thought leadership and make recommendations to business leadership to unlock growth opportunities, identify efficiencies, etc. through analysis of data insights.                     Enable business to self-service and meet BI demands through provision and ongoing management of appropriate tools, coupled with relevant trainings for the business.                     Develop Data talent across AXA XL, while embracing inclusion and diversity, to enable usage and value creation through our strategic digital, data and analytics assets.                     Oversee and manages the function s resource demand, capacity on in-flight projects as well as BAU work.                     Instill a customer-first culture, prioritizing service for our business stakeholders.          You will report to the Vice President, Division Lead - Business Intelligence & Reporting              SHARE your talent                         We re looking for someone who has these abilities and skills:                   Required Skills and Abilities:                            A minimum of a bachelor s or master s degree in a relevant discipline.                     Relevant experience in a data role (analytics, specialist, or engineer) supporting multiple specialty areas of Data and Analytics.                     Relevant years of experience in management, leading programs or colleagues.                     Experience in PowerBI & SQL. Experience in the insurance domain would be an added advantage.                     Ability to communicate well with the leadership team, peers, and teams across the globe, manage stakeholders effectively and navigate a matrixed global organization.                     Strategic leader with robust business acumen, project management, and commercial awareness.              Desired Skills and Abilities:                                 Ability to communicate well with the leadership team, peers, and teams across the globe, manage stakeholders effectively, and navigate a matrixed global organization.                     Brings in a collaborative spirit, a can-do attitude, and a Customer First mindset.                     Requires a combination of solid execution, strategic thinking, and the ability to connect the dots.                     Applies in-depth knowledge of business and specialized areas to solve business problems and understand integration challenges and long-term impact creatively and strategically.                      Excellent presentation, communication (oral & written), and relationship-building skills, across all levels of management and customer interaction.                      Passion for digital, data, and AI and experience working within a digital and data-driven organization.

You will be aligned with our Insights&Intelligence vertical and help us generate insights by leveraging the latest Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Analytics techniques to deliver value to our clients. You will also help us apply your expertise in building world-class solutions, conquering business problems, addressing technical challenges using AI Platforms and technologies. This information is used by businesses for direct marketing, site selection, and customer relationship management. You should have exposure to digital marketing, A/B testing, MVT, Google Analytics/Site Catalyst. In this role, you will be working on the interdisciplinary field about scientific methods, processes and systems to extract knowledge or insights from data in various forms, either structured or unstructured.  What are we looking for? column2: Role Description - Topic Advisory for Data and AI The Topic Advisory Team is a specialty sales advisory service within the Global Network. Prepare and help lead orals with innovating ways of selling to help differentiate Accenture. Content Management/ Continuous Improvement: Develop go-to-market approach/ assets. Maintain global repository of sales assets (e.g., proposals, stage 0 decks credentials, etc.) Conduct reviews (loss/delivery) with client teams to understand how we can improve and harvest deliverables. Stay relevant through training, research, client interaction and feedback sessions Qualification Job Qualifications  What are we looking for? Structured thinking with prior experience in sales and business development. Essential understanding of the Data and AI space including Accenture's offerings, particularly in emerging areas of AI. Collaborative attitude for working and interacting with deal teams and with leadership team and ability to manage in a professional setting. Proven relationship management skills at all levels. Confidence working under time pressure and in fast-paced environments. Understanding of proposal development/ writing experience.

column2: Team Summary      The CEMEA Risk Solutions team is responsible for leading the strategy,  prioritisation,  development and delivery of Visa s product roadmap for all  Risk solutions in the CEMEA markets.  The team collaborates with local and global stakeholders to develop the go-to-market and scale up Visa s risk and authentication solutions,  and enable value additive product development .  Our aim is to enable Visa clients and partners to drive better customer engagement and outcomes to grow their business.  The team is responsible for driving an innovation agenda that powers Visa s ambitions to expand into capabilities encompassing all payments brands and networks.           What a Senior Manager,  Risk Solutions does at Visa:      This role is responsible for executing the implementation of initiatives that expand the reach of Visa s Risk Solutions (Visa Risk Manager) to other Networks and Schemes in CEMEA region.  Network and Scheme Agnostic VRM expansion will be supported to ensure continued commercialisation and growth of Risk Products in CEMEA including Visa Advanced Authorization/Visa Risk Manager (VAAVRM),  Visa Strategy Manager (VSM) and related functionalities.      The role will own the execution and enablement of VRM functionalities across all portfolios of transactions relevant to Issuers.   For success,  you must work closely with internal stakeholders to develop and anchor integration workflows across schemes and networks as required that will ensure seamless and positive benefits for all stakeholders. .  You will be required to understand and map out diverse clients  cards payment network architecture ,  design optimum process flows and set in place streamlined project management.  A client-oriented mindset with a strong understanding of network payment flows and processes is key to the role.  Your passion for integrated solutioning and execution,  exceptional stakeholder skills and a delivery oriented approach will enable you to succeed.   You must be able to operate as a member of a team with ownership of your own deliverables.     This role is based in Bengaluru,  India and will work in partnership with our market teams across CEMEA region in the delivery of ambitious product delivery and revenue goals.     This role will report to the Senior Director: CEMEA Risk Solutions.     This is a hybrid position.  Hybrid employees can alternate time between both remote and office.  Employees in hybrid roles are expected to work from the office 2-3 set days a week (determined by leadership/site),  with a general guidepost of being in the office 50% or more of the time based on business needs.

column2: The CSG BI organization is responsible for insights and recommendations to optimize the user experiences of IT applications.              This includes analyses focused on application speed, stability, adoption, and user behaviors. Such work includes data ingestion, data munging, statistical analysis, data modelling, model evaluation, and model deployment.              Effective outputs require a simple user-friendly synthesis of information, including actionable insights, analytical solutions, and AI-powered products.              The team needs individuals with extensive business and analytical knowledge to deliver high value, actionable insights and recommendations.              We are looking for a candidate who has a solid background in analytics, demonstrates proven abilities to be innovative and creative, and is an effective collaborator and communicator enabling influence.              The candidate will have excellent analytics capabilities, expertise in analytical problem-solving techniques, project management skills, and product mindset.              He/she will have the experience of working on solving complex analytical problems and should be comfortable with analytical tools.              The person will be responsible for operating within a dynamic, fast-paced, scalable & agile IT development environment, which faces both internal and external customers.                    Job Responsibilities:                  Delivers analytical insights to provide actionable recommendations to influence Online Support product development and to optimize user experience by considering speed, stability, and key user behaviors;                  Develops and delivers on analytics roadmap for Online Support, while always identifying new opportunities and prioritization recommendations;                  Works with data engineers, data scientists, architects, application product owners, software developers, UX designers, and business partners to design strategic projects and break complex problems into smaller actionable tasks;                  Leads cross-functional engagements to define problem statements, establish KPIs, collect data, process data, build analytical models and make recommendations;                  Builds Artificial Intelligence/Machine Learning prototypes;                  Develops self-service analytics solutions to automate analytics;                  Presents findings to key stakeholders;                  Collects feedback and improves deployed products;                  Establishes relationship with key stakeholders or Point of Contacts to accelerate issue fixes;                  Leverages teamwork or cross-functional collaboration to influence the optimization of Online Support;                  Contribute to improving business processes and reducing overall issues for Online Support.                  Qualifications:                  Role Requirements:                  Excellent written and verbal communication skills, including the ability to convey analytic insights effectively to both IT and business leaders;                  Data Analytics, Data Science, Computer Science, Engineering, or Business Degree, or equivalent professional experience;                  8+ years of relevant work experience or 6+ years of work experience with a master degree;                  6+ years of experience with data analytics, business analytics, or data science;                  Hands-on analytics capabilities, expertise in analytical problem-solving techniques and frameworks, and the ability to deal with large volumes of data;                  Experience with Python/R and SQL;                  Experience with data visualization tools, such as Power BI, Tableau, or Looker;                  Knowledge of machine learning algorithms/concepts;                  Proficiency in statistics and research methods;                  Self-motivated with excellent capability of dealing with ambiguity;                  Demonstrated knowledge of project management, leadership/teamwork, and stakeholder/customer management skills, and business acumen;                  Comfortable with data cleaning processes to ensure data integrity;                  Eager to learn new skills and knowledge and apply new skills and concepts quickly;                              Preferences:                  MBA, Engineering or CS Degree from top schools;                  Experience with web analytics tools, such as Google Analytics, Adobe Analytics (SiteCatalyst or Omniture), or Coveo                  Experience with Oracle RDMBS, Snowflake, BigQuery                  Understanding of Tech Support and/or Order Support processes is a plus;                  Candidates may come from different strategy consulting backgrounds- Management Consulting, Digital strategy or eCommerce strategy.
