column2: The Sustainability Lead for Allianz Services is part of the global team, ensuring that sustainability is embodied within our organization. You will manage our overall Environmental, Social and Governance program and takes up on the Global-Line Environmental Officer and on the Corporate Citizenship Coordinator role, overseeing the Local Environment Officers (LEO) and Corporate Citizenship (CC) representatives across all Allianz Services locations.            What you do:         Drives overall ESG integration and acts as senior interface between Allianz Services and Group on all sustainability matters     Coordinates all local ESG integration efforts     Working with global ESG engagement and finance areas     Organize global sustainability-related projects to increase employee engagement and oversee global partnerships focused on sustainability     Assist PwC with organization of local audit process (e. g. on site coordination, audit follow up)     Informing and leveraging Group on ongoing sustainability efforts at Allianz Services level     Coordinating Allianz Services input/responses to international sustainability related regulations     Coordinating the data collection process globally and ensuring that group reporting deadlines are met, both for environmental and corporate citizenship (CC) KPIs     Help maintain the control framework together with Local Environment Officers (LEO) - periodically review process descriptions and key controls     Ensure that group data collection guidance is known at Allianz Services level for both environmental and corporate citizenship reporting     Preparing environmental and corporate citizenship action plan with relevant measures and activities to achieve Allianz Services targets, to support Group target on environmental performance, with direct involvement in the Strategic and Planning Dialogues; collaborate with related, responsible departments (e. g. purchasing, facility management, etc. )     Guiding implementation of measures and activities as agreed with Allianz Services management     Reporting to Allianz Services EMT and Allianz Technology Board on main environmental matters     Active participation in the LEO and CC network and acting as environmental and social consultant and champion within AZS     Adapt and create policies, standards, global functional rules and processes, where needed, for AZS             What you bring:         Relevant master s degree in environmental sciences, engineering, or sustainability     6+ years of experience in environmental, social and governance research     Excellent written and spoken English     Experience with Policy Language and ability to write policies and processes clearly     Strong sustainability-related regulatory and standards knowledge (e. g. , CSRD, GHG Standards Protocol etc. )     Strong engagement and communication skills     Good skills in MS Office (PowerPoint, Excel, Word)     Understand data and process flows     Exhibits initiative, independence, and organizational abilities.      Capability to establish and sustain working relationships with colleagues globally and with external parties     Collaborative person with high adaptability.      Proven experience in leading and motivating teams.      Proficient in organizing and implementing sustainability events     Outstanding analytical and problem-solving skills.              What we offer:         We offer a hybrid work model which recognizes the value of striking a balance between in-person collaboration and remote working incl. up to 25 days per year working from abroad     We believe in rewarding performance and our compensation and benefits package includes a company bonus scheme, pension, employee shares program and multiple employee discounts (details vary by location)     From career development and digital learning programs to international career mobility, we offer lifelong learning for our employees worldwide and an environment where innovation, delivery and empowerment are fostered     Flexible working, health and wellbeing offers (including healthcare and parental leave benefits) support to balance family and career and help our people return from career breaks with experience that nothing else can teach           We therefore welcome applications regardless of ethnicity or cultural background, age, gender, nationality, religion, disability or sexual orientation.      Join us. Let's care for tomorrow.

column2: As a Manager in a Digital Strategy role at PwC India, your aim is threefold:   1. to lead projects with clients throughout the discover, design, and target state phases of (digital) strategy engagements. Based on your previous work experience (strategist in digital consulting or tech consulting company, business analyst, product owner for digital solutions) you can combine   business objectives, customer needs, and technical solutions and translate these into impactful digital concepts.   2. You develop a team of consultants on the topic of digital strategy: team management on projects, internal knowledge sharing and overall coaching.   3. Finally, you are also willing to engage on the topic from a commercial perspective. In conjoint effort with the rest of the senior management team, you support in the development of new business. At the level of manager, this is mostly done by identifying on-project opportunities at your client and building relationships with senior project members at your clients.       You do this as part of our broader multidisciplinary team (Strategist, Technology Experts, Enterprise     Architects, Project Management Professionals, Domain Experts, Sector Experts)     PwC India, Digital Strategy is a technology centric advisory consulting practice in India and is a     specialized team, delivering customer-focused solutions. Our focus is on helping large companies     understand their digital maturity, develop, and design their business-led digital strategic roadmaps with the right technology foundation       Your key responsibilities       You are the day-to-day point of contact for clients and Associate Director and Directors on projects.     You structure and engage teams to deliver high quality outputs;     Along with senior management, you take the lead in identifying client issues and proposing the most appropriate approach for challenges that enterprise clients face;     You help develop the business and acquire new clients and engagements, including the identification and pursuit of business opportunities by forging strong client relationships;     You are involved in defining and delivering digital strategy projects to our clients;     You drive strategic discussions regarding business objectives and strategy KPIs.     You represent the voice of business strategy, leading the synthesis of quantitative and qualitative data to ensure project address their needs.     You drive ideation, evaluation, definition, and prioritization of features and use cases.     You help lead a cross-functional team of strategists and technology experts to deliver client-value     To qualify for the role you must have     Master degree in business or engineering     Bachelor degree in engineering     You have 5-7 years of experience in digital strategy, digital concept definition, digital realization;     You have delivered advice to clients on how to go from strategy to impactful consumer-facing   digital solutions;     You have experience with several of the following digital interactions (B2C or B2B): digital service concepts, e-commerce platforms, self-service platforms, smartphone applications, chatbots, ;     You have experience in project management and know how to ensure to deliver qualitative work in collaboration with client teams.     You have a strong business sense and know how to translate business objectives into digital solutions;     You partner effectively with business stakeholders & solve problems. You re comfortable and effective at framing decisions with clear and logical arguments;     You have extensive experience with design sprints and concept creation with the use of design thinking as a philosophy;     You are up to date on digital trends, mobile development, online marketing;     You have good product intuition and reinforce decisions through a deep understanding of customer insights and analytical data and are well-versed with using tools like MS Excel and     PowerBI for visualisation and analysis;     You have an understanding of agile development processes and have worked collab ratively with cross-functional teams;     You re comfortable operating in a fast-moving, fluid and dynamic environment.        You know how to       push things forward and constantly push toward clarity and successful delivery;     You have strong written and oral communication skills, with experience facilitating group discussions and building high quality presentations in PowerPoint;     Strong team spirit, balanced by a healthy sense of autonomy;     Excellent communication skills;     A global mindset, eagerness to learn, and the ability to function in global teams;     People management and project management experience       Ideal skills for this role       Communication and presentation skills (verbal & non-verbal)     Advanced English communication skills     Good project and engagement management skills     Understanding of project economics and project risk management procedures     Experience and skills on scoping projects and development of statements-of-work     Advanced MS Office knowledge (MS PowerPoint, MS Excel, MS Word)     Ability to express and present own opinion, objective line of reasoning skills     Ability to work independently     Ability to work in a team and stress resilience     Diligence, punctuality, a systematic responsible approach           Mandatory skill sets-   Digital Strategy     Preferred skill sets-   Digital Strategy     Year of experience required-   8+     Qualifications-   B.E/MBA

column2: We are seeking a talented Operations Developer to join our team and support our Master Data Management (MDM) project, specifically focusing on Reltio. The ideal candidate will play a key role in ensuring the smooth operation and optimization of our MDM platform, contributing to the overall success of our data management initiatives. Exposure to Data Governance principles and experience with tools like Collibra will be considered advantageous. Responsibilities: Collaborate with the MDM team to support the configuration, customization, and maintenance of the Reltio platform. Monitor and troubleshoot operational issues within the MDM environment, ensuring timely resolution to minimize impact on business operations. Work closely with cross-functional teams to implement data governance policies and procedures within the MDM framework, leveraging Collibra or similar tools. Assist in the design and implementation of data quality checks and validation rules to ensure the accuracy and reliability of master data. Participate in the testing and validation of new features, enhancements, and patches within the MDM/Reltio environment. Contribute to the documentation of operational procedures, system configurations, and troubleshooting guidelines for the MDM platform. Provide training and support to end-users and stakeholders on MDM best practices, usage guidelines, and data governance principles. Collaborate with IT infrastructure teams to ensure the availability, scalability, and performance of the MDM infrastructure. Stay informed about industry trends and best practices in MDM, data governance, and related technologies, making recommendations for continuous improvement. Actively participate in meetings, workshops, and project discussions to provide insights and recommendations for optimizing the MDM/Reltio environment. Requirements: Proven experience (2-5 years) in operations support or development roles, preferably in the context of Master Data Management or similar data management projects. Strong understanding of MDM concepts and methodologies, with hands-on experience working with Reltio or similar MDM platforms. Familiarity with data governance principles and experience with tools like Collibra or equivalent data governance platforms. Proficiency in scripting languages (e.g., Python, PowerShell) and experience with automation tools for operational tasks. Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to diagnose and resolve technical issues in a timely manner. Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to interact effectively with technical and non-technical stakeholders. Ability to work independently with minimal supervision and manage multiple tasks simultaneously. Experience with Agile methodologies and working in cross-functional teams is a plus. Certification in Reltio or Collibra is desirable but not mandatory

column2: Role & responsibilities  Analytical Skills: The ability to analyze data, identify trends, and draw meaningful insights is crucial for an MIS Executive. This includes proficiency in tools like Excel, SWOT Analysis, SAC Cloud Software, SAP_ Analytical Tool MIS Reporting and Analysis and possibly more specialized BI (Business Intelligence) tools. Production/Inventory : Should be able to work with Inventory and prodution team to ensure invoice generation, stock management etc... Technical Proficiency: Strong proficiency in relevant software and tools used for data management and reporting is essential. This may include Excel, SQL, Tableau, Power BI, etc. Familiarity with database management systems may also be necessary. Data Management: Knowledge of how to collect, organize, and manage large volumes of data efficiently is crucial. This includes data cleansing, validation, and transformation. Attention to Detail: MIS Executives deal with large datasets, and accuracy is paramount. Small errors in data can lead to incorrect conclusions and decisions. Problem-Solving Skills: The ability to identify and rectify data-related issues or discrepancies is important. This may involve debugging queries, finding patterns in data, or troubleshooting software. Communication Skills: An MIS Executive often needs to communicate complex data insights to non-technical stakeholders. The ability to present information in a clear and understandable way is vital. Time Management: Prioritizing tasks, meeting deadlines, and managing workload efficiently is important in a role that often involves handling multiple projects simultaneously. Business Acumen: Understanding the business context in which the MIS is being used is crucial. This allows the executive to focus on the most relevant data and provide insights that are aligned with organizational goals. Domain Knowledge: Familiarity with the FMCG industry or sector can be beneficial. It helps in contextualizing data and understanding specific requirements.
column11: BI analysis, Business Intelligence, SAP Analytical, Power BI, Analysis, Tableau, MIS Reporting

column2: Our mission to empower organizations with data driven decision making necessitates deriving actionable insights from raw data through innovative Business Intelligence (BI) strategies.                                                                                                                                                                  Your work will empower decision-makers by visualizing complex data sets through engaging dashboards and reports.                                                                                                                                                                  We are seeking an experienced and enthusiastic BI Manager to lead and drive excellence in the delivery of all BI projects within our consulting engagements.                                                                                                                                                                  A BI Manager at Saras is expected to play a critical role in shaping the future of our BI practice with involvement in both talent and project management                   A day at work                     Create data models and perform data transformation, cleansing, and aggregation using Power Query and M or DAX language.                     Optimize and enhance existing BI solutions to improve performance, usability, and user experience.                     Develop and maintain documentation for BI solutions, including data models, data flows, and report specifications.                     Leverage PowerApps and Power Automate to create efficient and user-friendly applications and automation workflows.                     Stay up to date with the latest BI features, best practices, and industry trends.                     Conduct training sessions and provide technical support to end-users of BI solutions.                       Relevant Background                               Bachelor s or master s degree in computer science, Business Analysis, Information Systems, Data Science, or a related field                 7+ years of experience developing interactive dashboards with at least 2+ years in a leadership role.                 Expertise in business intelligence, data modeling, and other technical BI concepts                 Experience in software development life cycle (SDLC), project management and technical documentation                 Strong understanding of storytelling, UIUX design and relational data modeling                 Proven track record of successfully delivering BI projects on time and within budget.                 Advanced technical proficiency in BI tools such as Tableau, Power BI, Looker, or similar platforms                 Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to effectively liaise with clients and team members.                 Strategic thinking and the ability to align BI initiatives with organizational objectives.                 Experience in managing and mentoring a team of BI professionals.

column2: About this role:         Wells Fargo is seeking a Lead Control Management Officer within the Enterprise Functions Control Management Team.           In this role, you will:               Lead complex initiatives designed to mitigate current and emerging risks with broad impact     Act as key participant in monitoring, evaluating, and measuring the impact of decisions practiced in Control Management functional area     Monitor moderately complex business specific programs, and provide risk management consulting to support the business in designing and implementing risk-mitigation strategies     Monitor, measure, evaluate, and report on the impact of decisions and controls to the relevant business group or functional area     Develop and implement risk monitoring and risk reporting processes and controls     Collaborate with relevant business group to identify current and emerging risks associated with business activities and operations, and provide guidance in developing and implementing risk-mitigating strategies     Lead Control Management project or virtual teams         Lead complex initiatives with broad impact which are designed to mitigate current and emerging business risk issues and concerns; act as key participant in large-scale, cross-functional planning for Enterprise Functions.     Make decisions in complex and multifaceted situations requiring solid understanding of Control Organization operations; facilitate decision-making and problem resolution, and support implementation of developed solutions and plans; influence and lead key business partners to meet deliverables and drive new initiatives.     Demonstrate negotiation skills, especially with difficult topics when partnering with senior management. This includes the willingness and ability to question decisions, understand direction and escalate issues, where necessary.     Ability to synthesize data from a variety of sources and deliver results quickly.     Demonstrate the ability to deliver high quality output from self and team.     Strategically collaborate and consult with peers, colleagues, and mid to senior-level managers to identify current and emerging opportunities associated with business activities and operations, and provide guidance in interpreting, developing, and implementing business strategy.       Drive and support transformation change that helps achieve strategic initiatives across the organization, including leading initiatives and supporting adoption across the team.       Balance strong, innovative problem-solving skills with the practical ability to implement workable solutions to problems in a fast-paced, deadline driven environment.           Required Qualifications:           5+ years of Risk Management or Control Management experience, or equivalent demonstrated through one or a combination of the following: work experience, training, military experience, education               Desired Qualifications:           Advanced Microsoft Office skills, SharePoint administration, Power Apps development.     Working knowledge and experience on Power BI, Tableau, Python & SQL     Experience of defining and building operational metrics to monitor and track performance and Risk.     Excellent verbal, written, and interpersonal communication skills including the ability to prepare and present management level presentations.     Ability to articulate and document complex concepts in a clear manner.     Ability to work well independently with limited direction or guidance.     Proven ability to execute in a fast paced, high demand, environment while balancing multiple priorities.     Proficient in advance excel formulas and PowerPoint presentations.     Proficiency in digital tools, data analytics, and technology integration.     Education: Bachelor s or master s in business, Finance, Computer Science, or related fields.     Strategic Thinking: Ability to align digital strategies with overall business goals.     Analytical Skills: Proficiency in data analysis, problem-solving, and decision-making.     Digital Innovation: Stay updated on emerging technologies and innovative digital solutions and willingness to experiment with new solutions.     Communication and Collaboration: Strong interpersonal skills to effectively liaise with global cross-functional teams, including IT and business.     Project Management: Ability to manage product roadmaps, timelines, and resources to ensure successful delivery of digital initiatives.               Job Expectations:           Overall experience of 6+ years relevant experience in Financial Services industry and / or risk & control domains covering operational risk, controls testing / evaluation, compliance, internal audit, risk management etc.     Strong analytical skills with high attention to detail and accuracy.     Excellent verbal, written, interpersonal communication skills and stakeholder management.     Demonstrate positive attitude and readiness to work in a challenging and dynamic environment.     Flexibility to multitask and work across domains and business groups.     Proven experience in leading projects and initiatives independently and in a group, mentoring junior associates, and driving results.     Ability to credibly challenge, conduct tough conversations and effectively communicate with various levels of management, including senior leaders and executives.       @RWF24

column2: Elevate Your Impact Through Innovation & Impact Evalueserve is a global leader in delivering innovative and sustainable solutions to a diverse range of clients, including over 30% of Fortune 500 companies.  With presence in more than 45 countries across five continents, we excel in leveraging state-of-the-art technology, artificial intelligence, and unparalleled subject matter expertise to elevate our clients' business impact and strategic decision-making.  We have 4,500+ talented professionals operating across 45 countries, including India, China, Chile, Romania, the US, and Canada. Our global network also extends to emerging markets such as Colombia, the Middle East, and the rest of Asia-Pacific.  Recognized by  Great Place to Work  in India, Chile, Romania, the US, and the UK in 2023, we offer a dynamic, growth-oriented, and open culture that prioritizes flexible work-life balance, diverse and inclusive teams, and equal opportunities for all.    About Data Analytics (DA) Data Analytics is one of the highest growth LOB within Evalueserve, providing you rewarding career opportunities. Established in 2014, the global DA team extends beyond 1000+ (and growing) data science professionals across data engineering, business intelligence, digital marketing, advanced analytics, technology, and product engineering. Our more tenured teammates, some of whom have been with Evalueserve since it started more than 20 years ago, have enjoyed leadership opportunities in different regions of the world across our seven business lines.   What you will be doing at Evalueserve Working on multiple BI Modernization engagements across industries & technology platforms to support BI Roadmap development, Data migration, BI architecture design and implementation, Dashboard Migration, Rationalization, Rejuvenation, Embedded Analytics, Simulation, ML/AI/GenAI Integration, Governance, Cataloging & Dashboard development.  Providing expert guidance on Power BI & Looker configuration/architecture (premium features, admin settings, GCP/Azure focused on performance & scalability, GenAI, Copilot, Fabric etc.)  Ideating and setting up BI Accelerators to fast-track value creation. Driving holistic BI Solutions that covers BI Modernization & Governance, Data Visualization and Optimization, Data Engineering/Preparation & Embedded Analytics Developing inspiring visualizations that deliver a great story and that enable key business stakeholders to take important business decisions.     What were looking at Graduate / Post-graduate in Engineering or a similar field from a reputed university  8+ years of experience delivering advanced business intelligence projects working with data visualization tools such as Power BI & Looker End to end dashboard development- Storyboarding, Wireframe design, Dashboard development, Look & feel, Automation, Optimization and Deployment  Provide inputs for improving dashboard performance and suggest efficient data transformations for creating dashboards.  Understand the technical architecture to keep pace with changing business demands and new software releases. automation     We seek exceptional leaders who are innovative, leverage technology, and deliver actionable insights that contribute to our companys success       We are looking for an experienced column1: Manager of Analytics - Revenue Cycle Management
column2: Lead and manage a team of analysts focused on RCM and EHR data.                                  Develop strategies and methodologies for analyzing large datasets from EHR and RCM systems.                                  Provide insights and recommendations to improve revenue cycle efficiency, patient care, and overall financial performance.                                  Oversee the creation and maintenance of analytical tools, dashboards, and reports to monitor key performance indicators.                                  Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including finance, IT, and clinical departments, to implement data-driven solutions.                                  Ensure the accuracy and integrity of data analysis and reporting.                                  Stay abreast of industry trends, regulatory changes, and technological advancements in healthcare analytics.                                  Foster a culture of continuous improvement and data-driven decision-making within the organization.                                        Qualifications:                                        Bachelor s or Master s degree in Data Science, Health Informatics, Statistics, Business Administration, or related field.                                  Minimum of 5 years of experience in analytics, with at least 2 years in a managerial role.                                  Proven experience in Revenue Cycle Management and Electronic Health Records analysis.                                  Strong leadership skills with the ability to mentor and develop a high-performing analytics team.                                  Expertise in SQL, Excel, and data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, PowerBI).                                  Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and project management skills.                                  Strong communication and collaboration abilities.                                  Knowledge of healthcare regulatory requirements and standards is highly desirable.
column11: Data analysis, Analytical, Project management, Healthcare, healthcare analytics, data visualization, Continuous improvement, Revenue cycle management, Analytics, SQL

column2: A career within Technology Strategy services, will provide you with the opportunity to help organisations develop strategies that transform their technology capabilities and solve their most critical challenges     We focus on building technology enabled and agile operating models, planning their new enterprise architecture into a differentiating capability system that helps them win in the market, leveraging digital analytics to enhance the customer experience and optimising business operations, and using modern management techniques such as robotic process automation and next generation sourcing strategies to help our clients get fit for growth           1. to lead projects with clients throughout the discover, design, and target state phases of (digital) strategy engagements. Based on your previous work experience (strategist in digital consulting or tech consulting company, business analyst, product owner for digital solutions) you can combine   business objectives, customer needs, and technical solutions and translate these into impactful digital concepts.       2. You develop a team of consultants on the topic of digital strategy: team management on projects, internal knowledge sharing and overall coaching.       3. Finally, you are also willing to engage on the topic from a commercial perspective. In conjoint effort with the rest of the senior management team, you support in the development of new business. At the level of manager, this is mostly done by identifying on-project opportunities at your client and building relationships with senior project members at your clients.         You do this as part of our broader multidisciplinary team (Strategist, Technology Experts, Enterprise     Architects, Project Management Professionals, Domain Experts, Sector Experts)     PwC India, Digital Strategy is a technology centric advisory consulting practice in India and is a     specialized team, delivering customer-focused solutions. Our focus is on helping large companies     understand their digital maturity, develop, and design their business-led digital strategic roadmaps with     the right technology foundation       Your key responsibilities       You are the day-to-day point of contact for clients and Associate Director and Directors on     projects. You structure and engage teams to deliver high quality outputs;     Along with senior management, you take the lead in identifying client issues and proposing the     most appropriate approach for challenges that enterprise clients face;     You help develop the business and acquire new clients and engagements, including the     identification and pursuit of business opportunities by forging strong client relationships;     You are involved in defining and delivering digital strategy projects to our clients;     You drive strategic discussions regarding business objectives and strategy KPIs.     You represent the voice of business strategy, leading the synthesis of quantitative and qualitative     data to ensure project address their needs.     You drive ideation, evaluation, definition, and prioritization of features and use cases.     You help lead a cross-functional team of strategists and technology experts to deliver client-value     To qualify for the role you must have     Master degree in business or engineering     Bachelor degree in engineering     You have 5-7 years of experience in digital strategy, digital concept definition, digital realization;     You have delivered advice to clients on how to go from strategy to impactful consumer-facing digital solutions;     You have experience with several of the following digital interactions (B2C or B2B): digital service concepts, e-commerce platforms, self-service platforms, smartphone applications, chatbots, ;     You have experience in project management and know how to ensure to deliver qualitative work in collaboration with client teams.     You have a strong business sense and know how to translate business objectives into digital solutions;     You partner effectively with business stakeholders solve problems.     You re comfortable and effective at framing decisions with clear and logical arguments;     You have extensive experience with design sprints and concept creation with the use of design thinking as a philosophy;     You are up to date on digital trends, mobile development, online marketing;     You have good product intuition and reinforce decisions through a deep understanding of customer insights and analytical data and are well-versed with using tools like MS Excel and PowerBI for visualisation and analysis;     You have an understanding of agile development processes and have worked collaboratively with cross-functional teams;     You re comfortable operating in a fast-moving, fluid and dynamic environment.      You know how to push things forward and constantly push toward clarity and successful delivery;       You have strong written and oral communication skills, with experience facilitating group discussions and building high quality presentations in PowerPoint;     Strong team spirit, balanced by a healthy sense of autonomy;     Excellent communication skills;     A global mindset, eagerness to learn, and the ability to function in global teams;     People management and project management experience       Ideal skills for this role       Communication and presentation skills (verbal non-verbal)     Advanced English communication skills     Good project and engagement management skills     Understanding of project economics and project risk management procedures     Experience and skills on scoping projects and development of statements-of-work     Advanced MS Office knowledge (MS PowerPoint, MS Excel, MS Word)   Ability to express and present own opinion, objective line of reasoning skills     Ability to work independently     Ability to work in a team and stress resilience     Diligence, punctuality, a systematic responsible approach
column11: Process automation, Team management, Project management, Analytical, Online marketing, Consulting, Agile, Business strategy, MS Office, Powerpoint
